GP12narsippu:1606: taraṇiḥ śāśvataḥ śāstā śāstrajñas tapanaḥ śayaḥ /
GP12narsippu:1607: vedagarbho vibhur vīraḥ śāntaḥ sāvitrivallabhaḥ // NsP_19.13 //
GP12narsippu:1609: mahendro varuṇo dhātā viṣṇur agnir divākaraḥ // NsP_19.14 //
GP12narsippu:1610: etais tu nāmabhiḥ sūryaḥ stutas tena mahātmanā /
GP12narsippu:1611: uvāca viśvakarmāṇaṃ prasanno bhagavān raviḥ // NsP_19.15 //
GP12narsippu:1612: bhramim āropya mām atra maṇḍalaṃ mama śātaya /
GP12narsippu:1613: tvadbuddhisthaṃ mayā jñātam evam auṣṇyaṃ śamaṃ vrajet // NsP_19.16 //
GP12narsippu:1614: ityukto viśvakarmā ca tathā sa kṛtavān dvija /
GP12narsippu:1615: śāntoṣṇaḥ savitā tasya duhitur viśvakarmaṇaḥ // NsP_19.17 //
GP12narsippu:1616: saṃjñāyāś cābhavad vipra bhānus tvaṣṭāram abravīt /
GP12narsippu:1617: tvayā yasmāt stuto 'haṃ vai nāmnām aṣṭaśatena ca // NsP_19.18 //
GP12narsippu:1618: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva tasmāt tvaṃ varado 'haṃ tavānagha /
GP12narsippu:1619: ityukto bhānunā so 'tha viśvakarmābravīd idam // NsP_19.19 //
GP12narsippu:1620: varado yadi me deva varam etaṃ prayaccha me /
GP12narsippu:1621: etais tu nāmabhis yas tvāṃ naraḥ stoṣyati nityaśaḥ // NsP_19.20 //
GP12narsippu:1622: tasya pāpakṣayaṃ deva kuru bhaktasya bhāskara // NsP_19.21 //
GP12narsippu:1623: tenaivam ukto dinakṛt tatheti tvaṣṭāram uktvā virarāma bhāskaraḥ /
GP12narsippu:1624: saṃjñāṃ viśaṅkāṃ ravimaṇḍalasthitāṃ kṛtvā jagāmātha raviṃ prasādya // NsP_19.22 //
GP12narsippu:1628: purā devāsure yuddhe devair indrādibhir diteḥ // NsP_20.1 //
GP12narsippu:1629: ḥputrāḥ parābhūtā ditiś ca vinaṣṭaputrā mahendradarpaharaṃ putram icchantī kaśyapam ṛṣiṃ svapatim ārādhayām_asa || NsP_20.2 ||
GP12narsippu:1630: ḥsa ca tapasā saṃtuṣṭo garbhādhānaṃ cakāra tasyām |
GP12narsippu:1632: ḥyadi tvaṃ śuciḥ satī śaracchatam imaṃ garbhaṃ dhārayiṣyasi tataś ca mahendradarpahantā putro bhaviṣyati |

GP12narsippu:1985: tasya suptasya nābhau tu mahat padmam ajāyata /

GP12narsippu:1997: tatas tv anviṣya rājendra salilānte na dṛṣṭavān /
GP12narsippu:1998: śrīśaṃ punas tam evāhaṃ padmam āśritya cintayan // NsP_25.46 //
GP12narsippu:1999: tad rūpaṃ vāsudevasya draṣṭuṃ tepe mahat tapaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2000: tato mām antarikṣasthā vāg uvācāśarīriṇī // NsP_25.47 //
GP12narsippu:2001: vṛthā kiṃ kliśyate brahman sāṃprataṃ kuru me vacaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2002: na dṛśyo bhagavān viṣṇus tapasā mahatāpi te // NsP_25.48 //
GP12narsippu:2003: sṛṣṭiṃ kuru tadājñapto yadi draṣṭum ihecchasi /
GP12narsippu:2007: bhaja nityam anālasyas tato drakṣyasi mādhavam /
GP12narsippu:2008: tayetthaṃ codito rājaṃs tyaktvā taptam anukṣaṇam // NsP_25.51 //
GP12narsippu:2009: sṛṣṭavān lokabhūtānāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ sṛṣṭvā sthitasya ca /
GP12narsippu:2010: āvir babhūva manasi viśvakarmā prajāpatiḥ // NsP_25.52 //
GP12narsippu:2011: anantakṛṣṇayos tena dve rūpe nirmite śubhe /
GP12narsippu:2012: vimānastho yathāpūrvaṃ mayā dṛṣṭo jale nṛpa // NsP_25.53 //
GP12narsippu:2013: tathaiva taṃ tato bhaktyā saṃpūjyāhaṃ hariṃ sthitaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2014: tatprasādāt tapaḥ śreṣṭhaṃ mayā jñānam anuttamam // NsP_25.54 //
GP12narsippu:2016: tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi hitaṃ nṛpavareśvara // NsP_25.55 //
GP12narsippu:2017: visṛjyaitat tapo ghoraṃ purīṃ vraja nijāṃ nṛpa /
GP12narsippu:2018: prajānāṃ pālanaṃ dharmas tapaś caiva mahībhṛtām // NsP_25.56 //
GP12narsippu:2020: tatrārādhaya deveśaṃ bāhyārthair akhilaiḥ śubhaiḥ // NsP_25.57 //
GP12narsippu:2022: niṣkāmo nṛpaśārdūla prajā dharmeṇa pālaya // NsP_25.58 //
GP12narsippu:2023: prasādād vāsudevasya muktis te bhavitā nṛpa /
GP12narsippu:2024: ity uktvā taṃ jagāmātha brahmalokaṃ pitāmahaḥ // NsP_25.59 //
GP12narsippu:2026: āvir babhūva purato vimānaṃ tan mahībhṛtaḥ // NsP_25.60 //
GP12narsippu:2028: taṃ dṛṣṭvā parayā bhaktyā natvā ca puruṣottamam // NsP_25.61 //
GP12narsippu:2029: ṛṣīn praṇamya viprāṃś ca tad ādāya yayau purīm /

GP12narsippu:2031: lājā vinikṣipadbhiś ca nīto rājā svakaṃ gṛham /

GP12narsippu:2034: mahiṣyaḥ śobhanā yās tu piṣṭvā tu haricandanam // NsP_25.64 //
GP12narsippu:2035: mālāṃ kṛtvā sugandhāḍhyāṃ prītis tasya vavardha ha /
GP12narsippu:2036: paurāḥ karpūraṃ śrīkhaṇḍaṃ kuṅkumādy aguruṃ tathā // NsP_25.65 //
GP12narsippu:2037: kṛtsnaṃ viśeṣato vastraṃ mahiṣākhyaṃ ca guggulam /

GP12narsippu:2040: trisaṃdhyaṃ parayā bhaktyā japaiḥ stotraiś ca vaiṣṇavaiḥ // NsP_25.67 //
GP12narsippu:2042: prekṣaṇair api śāstroktaiḥ prītaiś ca niśi jāgaraiḥ // NsP_25.68 //
GP12narsippu:2044: yāgaiś ca toṣayitvā taṃ sarvadevamayaṃ harim // NsP_25.69 //
GP12narsippu:2045: niṣkāmo dānadharmaiś ca paraṃ jñānam avāptavān /
GP12narsippu:2046: yajan yajñaṃ mahīṃ rakṣan sa kurvan keśavārcanam // NsP_25.70 //
GP12narsippu:2047: utpādya putrān pitrarthaṃ dhyānāt tyaktvā kalevaram /

GP12narsippu:2049: ajaṃ viśokaṃ vimalaṃ viśuddhaṃ śāntaṃ sadānandacidātmakaṃ tataḥ /
GP12narsippu:2050: vihāya saṃsāram anantaduḥkhaṃ jagāma tad viṣṇupadaṃ hi rājā // NsP_25.72 //
GP12narsippu:2055_0: ḥsa tu siddhe pitari maharṣibhir abhiṣikto dharmeṇa pṛthivīṃ pālayan vimānastham
GP12narsippu:2055_1: anantabhogaśāyinam acyutam ārādhya yāgair api devān iṣṭvā svaputraṃ rājye subāhum
GP12narsippu:2057_0: ḥsa tu saptadvīpāṃ pṛthvīṃ dharmeṇa pālayitvā bhaktiṃ parāṃ nārāyaṇe pitāmahavat
GP12narsippu:2057_1: kṛtvā kratubhir bhūridakṣiṇair yajñeśvaraṃ niṣkāmena manaseṣṭvā nityaṃ nirañjanaṃ
GP12narsippu:2057_2: nirvikalpaṃ paraṃ jyotir amṛtākṣaraṃ paramātmarūpaṃ dhyātvā harim anantaṃ ca param
GP12narsippu:2058: ḥtasya yuvanāśvo yuvanāśvasya ca māndhātā putro 'bhavat |
GP12narsippu:2059: ḥsa cābhiṣikto maharṣibhir nisargād eva viṣṇubhakto 'nantaśayanam acyutaṃ bhaktyārādhayan yāgaiś ca vividhair iṣṭvā saptadvīpavatīṃ pṛthivīṃ paripālya divaṃ gataḥ || NsP_26.2 ||
GP12narsippu:2061: yāvat sūrya udeti sma yāvac ca pratitiṣṭhati /

GP12narsippu:2063: ḥtasya purukuśyo 'bhavad yena devā brāhmaṇāś ca yāgadānaiḥ saṃtuṣṭāḥ || NsP_26.4 ||
GP12narsippu:2066: ḥsagarād dharyaśvo haryaśvād dhārīto hārītād rohitāśvaḥ |
GP12narsippu:2069: ḥyena mahatā tapasā purā divo gaṅgā aśeṣakalmaṣanāśinī caturvidhapuruṣārthadāyinī bhuvam ānītā |
GP12narsippu:2070: ḥasthiśarkarābhūtāḥ kapilamaharṣinirdagdhāś ca guravaḥ sagarākhyā gaṅgātoyasaṃspṛṣṭā divam āropitāḥ |
GP12narsippu:2074: ḥtasya gṛhe rāvaṇavināśārthaṃ sākṣān nārāyaṇo 'vatīrṇo rāmaḥ || NsP_26.9 ||
GP12narsippu:2075: ḥsa tu pitṛvacanād bhrātṛbhāryāsahito daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ prāpya tapaś cacāra |
GP12narsippu:2076_1: mahodadhau setuṃ nibadhya tair gatvā laṅkāṃ rāvaṇaṃ devakaṇṭakaṃ sabāndhavaṃ hatvā
GP12narsippu:2076_2: sītām ādāya punar ayodhyāṃ prāpya bharatābhiṣikto vibhīṣaṇāya laṅkārājyaṃ vimānaṃ
GP12narsippu:2077: ḥsa tu parameśvaro vimānastho vibhīṣaṇena nīyamāno laṅkāyām api rākṣasapuryāṃ vastum anicchan puṇyāraṇyaṃ tatra sthāpitavān || NsP_26.10 ||
GP12narsippu:2078: ḥtan nirīkṣya tatraiva mahāhibhogaśayane bhagavān śete |
GP12narsippu:2079: ḥso 'pi vibhīṣaṇas tatas tadvimānaṃ netum asamarthaḥ tadvacanāt svāṃ purīṃ jagāma || NsP_26.11 ||
GP12narsippu:2080: ḥnārāyaṇasaṃnidhānān mahad vaiṣṇavaṃ kṣetram abhavad adyāpi dṛśyate |
GP12narsippu:2081: ḥrāmāl lavo lavāt padmaḥ padmād ṛtuparṇa ṛṭuparṇād astrapāṇiḥ |
GP12narsippu:2084: ete mahīpā ravivaṃśajās tava prādhānyatas te kathitā mahābalāḥ /
GP12narsippu:2085: purātanair yair vasudhā prapālitā yajñakriyābhiś ca divaukasair nṛpaiḥ // NsP_26.13 //
GP12narsippu:2086: || iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe sūryavaṃśānucaritaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ || NarP 26 ||
GP12narsippu:2089: ḥatha somavaṃśodbhavānāṃ bhūbhujāṃ saṃkṣepeṇa caritam ucyate || NsP_27.1 ||
GP12narsippu:2090: ḥādau tāvat samastaṃ trailokyaṃ kukṣau kṛtvā ekārṇave mahāmbhasi nāgabhogaśayane || NsP_27.2 ||
GP12narsippu:2091: ḥṛṅmayo yajurmayaḥ sāmamayo 'tharvamayo bhagavān nārāyaṇo yoganidrāṃ samārebhe |
GP12narsippu:2096: ḥsa tu prajāpater dakṣasya trayastriṃśat kanyā rohiṇyādyā bhāryārthaṃ gṛhītvā priyāyāṃ jyeṣṭhāyāṃ viśeṣāt prasannamanāḥ rohiṇyāṃ budhaṃ putram utpādayām_asa || NsP_27.4 ||
GP12narsippu:2099: ḥtasyātiśayarūpānvitasya svargabhogān vihāya urvaśī bahukālaṃ bhāryā babhūva || NsP_27.5 ||
GP12narsippu:2101: ḥsa tu rājyaṃ dharmataḥ kṛtvā divam āruroha || NsP_27.6 ||
GP12narsippu:2108: ḥyasya pṛthivyāṃ saṃpannāḥ sarve kāmāḥ || NsP_27.9 ||
GP12narsippu:2110: ḥsa tu sarvāṃ pṛthivīṃ dharmeṇa paripālayan narasiṃhaṃ bhagavantam ārādhya yāgadānaiḥ siddhim āpa || NsP_27.10 ||
GP12narsippu:2112: ḥyasya vaṃśe purā devāsurasaṃgrāme viṣṇucakrahataḥ kālanemiḥ kaṃso bhūtvā vṛṣṇivaṃśajena vāsudevena ghātito nidhanaṃ gataḥ || NsP_27.11 ||
GP12narsippu:2114: ḥsa tu narasiṃhaṃ bhagavantam ārādhya tatprasādān niṣkaṇṭakaṃ rājyaṃ dharmeṇa kṛtvā divaṃ prāptavān |
GP12narsippu:2115_0: ḥduṣyantasya śakuntalāyāṃ bharataḥ sa tu dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kurvan kratubhir bhūridakṣiṇaiḥ
GP12narsippu:2115_1: sarvadevatāmayaṃ bhagavantam ārādhya nivṛttādhikāro brahmadhyānaparo vaiṣṇave pare
GP12narsippu:2117: ḥsa ca paramavaiṣṇavo narasiṃham ārādhya jātaputro dharmeṇa kṛtarājyo viṣṇupuram āruroha || NsP_27.13 ||
GP12narsippu:2119: ḥso 'pi bahuvarṣaṃ dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kurvan duṣṭanigrahaṃ śiṣṭaparipālanaṃ saptadvīpāṃ vaśe cakre |
GP12narsippu:2120: ḥvṛṣṇer ugrasenāyāṃ pratyañcaḥ putro babhūva || NsP_27.14 ||
GP12narsippu:2121: ḥso 'pi dharmeṇa medinīṃ pālayan pratisaṃvatsaraṃ jyotiṣṭomaṃ cakāra |
GP12narsippu:2124: ḥtasya devadattasyandanārohaṇam aśakyaṃ babhūva purataḥ śakyaṃ ca || NsP_27.16 ||
GP12narsippu:2125: || iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe somavaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāma saptaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ || NarP 27 ||
GP12narsippu:2129: paścāc chaktiḥ kathaṃ cāsīt tasya vai tad vadasva naḥ // NsP_28.1 //
GP12narsippu:2132: sarvapāpaharaṃ tad dhi caritaṃ śāṃtanor nṛṇām // NsP_28.2 //
GP12narsippu:2136: rājñā śāṃtanunā vipra tasmāt syandanam uttamam // NsP_28.4 //
GP12narsippu:2137: devadattaṃ tad āroḍhum aśaktas tatkṣaṇād abhūt /
GP12narsippu:2138: kim iyaṃ me gatir bhagnā sahasā vai rathāt tataḥ // NsP_28.5 //
GP12narsippu:2139: duḥkhaṃ cintayatas tasya saṃprāpto nāradaḥ kila /
GP12narsippu:2140: kiṃ viṣaṇṇaḥ sthito rājann iti pṛṣṭaḥ sa śāṃtanuḥ // NsP_28.6 //
GP12narsippu:2142: ityukto nārado dhyātvā jñātvā tatkāraṇaṃ tataḥ // NsP_28.7 //
GP12narsippu:2143: śāṃtanuṃ prāha rājānaṃ vinayena yataḥ sthitaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2144: yatra kvāpi tvayā rājan narasiṃhasya vai dhruvam // NsP_28.8 //
GP12narsippu:2146: gatir bhagnā mahārāja śrūyatām atra kāraṇam // NsP_28.9 //
GP12narsippu:2147: antarvedyāṃ purā rājann āsīt kaścin mahāmatiḥ /
GP12narsippu:2148: mālākāro ravir nāmnā tena vṛndāvanaṃ kṛtam // NsP_28.10 //
GP12narsippu:2149: vividhāni ca puṣpārthaṃ vanāni sukṛtāni vai /
GP12narsippu:2151: prākāram ucchritaṃ tasya svabhūmau cāpi vistṛtam /
GP12narsippu:2152: alaṅghyam apraveśyaṃ ca kṛtvā cakre svakaṃ gṛham // NsP_28.12 //
GP12narsippu:2153: gṛhaṃ praviśya taddvāraṃ bhaven nānyatra sattama /
GP12narsippu:2154: evaṃ kṛtvā nu vasato mālākārasya dhīmataḥ // NsP_28.13 //
GP12narsippu:2155: puṣpitaṃ tad vanaṃ tv āsīd gandhāmoditadiṅmukham /
GP12narsippu:2156: bhāryayā saha puṣpāṇi samāhṛtya dine dine // NsP_28.14 //
GP12narsippu:2158: dadau kāścid dvijebhyaś ca kāścid vikrīya poṣaṇam // NsP_28.15 //
GP12narsippu:2159: cakre samāt prajīvī ca bhāryāder ātmanas tathā /
GP12narsippu:2160: atha svargād upāgamya indraputro rathena vai // NsP_28.16 //
GP12narsippu:2163: dine dine hṛte puṣpe mālākāro 'py acintayat /
GP12narsippu:2164: nānyad dvāraṃ vanasyāsyā- laṅghyaprākāram unnatam // NsP_28.18 //
GP12narsippu:2166: ahaṃ śaktiṃ na paśyāmi kim idaṃ nu parīkṣaye // NsP_28.19 //
GP12narsippu:2167: iti saṃcintya medhāvī jāgrad rātrau vane sthitaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2168: tathaivāgatya puṣpāṇi saṃgṛhītva gataḥ pumān // NsP_28.20 //
GP12narsippu:2170: tato nidrāṃ gataḥ svapne dṛṣṭavāṃs taṃ nṛkesarim // NsP_28.21 //
GP12narsippu:2171: tadvākyaṃ śrutavāṃś caivaṃ nirmālyaṃ mama putraka /
GP12narsippu:2174: iti śrutvā harer vākyaṃ narasiṃhasya dhīmataḥ // NsP_28.23 //
GP12narsippu:2175: buddhvānīya tu nirmālyaṃ tathā cakre yathoditam /
GP12narsippu:2176: so 'py āgatya yathāpūrvaṃ rathenālakṣitena tu // NsP_28.24 //
GP12narsippu:2177: rathād uttīrya puṣpāṇi vicinvaṃs tadbhuvi sthitam /
GP12narsippu:2179: tatas tasya na śaktiḥ syad rathārohaṇakarmaṇi /
GP12narsippu:2180: uktaḥ sārathinā caiva rathasyārohaṇe tava // NsP_28.26 //
GP12narsippu:2182: gacchāmi divam evāhaṃ tvaṃ bhūmyāṃ vasa māruha // NsP_28.27 //
GP12narsippu:2183: tenaivam ukto matimāṃs tam āha harinandanaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2184: pāpasya nodanaṃ tv atra karmaṇā yena me bhavet // NsP_28.28 //
GP12narsippu:2185: tad uktvā gaccha nākaṃ tvaṃ karmāsmān sārathe drutam // NsP_28.29ab //
GP12narsippu:2187: rāmasattre kurukṣetre dvādaśābde tu nityaśaḥ // NsP_28.29cd //
GP12narsippu:2189: ity uktvāsau gataḥ svargaṃ sārathir devasevitam // NsP_28.30 //
GP12narsippu:2191: rāmasattre tathā kuryād dvijocchiṣṭasya mārjanam // NsP_28.31 //
GP12narsippu:2192: pūrṇe dvādaśame varṣe tam ūcuḥ śaṅkitā dvijāḥ /
GP12narsippu:2193: kas tvaṃ brūhi mahābhāga nityam ucchiṣṭamārjakaḥ // NsP_28.32 //
GP12narsippu:2194: na bhuñjase ca naḥ sattre śaṅkā no mahatī bhavet /
GP12narsippu:2195: ityuktaḥ kathayitvā tu yathāvṛttam anukramāt // NsP_28.33 //
GP12narsippu:2196: jagāma tridivaṃ kṣipraṃ rathena tanayo hareḥ /
GP12narsippu:2197: tasmāt tvam api bhūpāla brāhmaṇocchiṣṭam ādarāt // NsP_28.34 //
GP12narsippu:2199: brāhmaṇebhyaḥ paraṃ nāsti sarvapāpaharaṃ param // NsP_28.35 //
GP12narsippu:2201: bhaviṣyati mahīpāla prāyaścitte kṛte tava // NsP_28.36 //
GP12narsippu:2202: ata ūrdhvaṃ ca nirmālyaṃ mā laṅghaya mahāmate /
GP12narsippu:2205: kṛtavān dvādaśābdaṃ tu āruroha rathaṃ ca tam // NsP_28.38 //
GP12narsippu:2206: evaṃ purvam aśaktiḥ syād rathārohe mahīkṣitaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2207: paścāt tasyaiva viprendra śaktir evam ajāyata // NsP_28.39 //
GP12narsippu:2208: evaṃ te kathito vipra doṣo nirmālyalaṅghane /
GP12narsippu:2209: puṇyaṃ tathā dvijānāṃ tu proktam ucchiṣṭamārjane // NsP_28.40 //
GP12narsippu:2210: bhaktyā dvijocchiṣṭam ihāpamārjayec chucir naro yaḥ susamāhitātmā /
GP12narsippu:2211: sa pāpabandhaṃ pravihāya bhuṅkte gavāṃ pradānasya phalaṃ divi sthitaḥ // NsP_28.41 //
GP12narsippu:2216: ḥsa tu hastināpure sthitvā prajāḥ svadharmeṇa pālayan devāṃś ca yāgaiḥ pitṛṃś ca śrāddhaiḥ saṃtarpya saṃjātaputro divam āruroha || NsP_29.1 ||
GP12narsippu:2218: ḥso 'pi rājyaṃ dharmataḥ kṛtvā muniśāpāc charīraṃ vihāya devalokam avāpa |
GP12narsippu:2220_0: ḥsa tu mahatā tapasā śaṃkaraṃ toṣayitvā pāśupatam astram avāpya triviṣṭapādhipateḥ
GP12narsippu:2220_1: śatrūn nivātakavacān dānavān hatvā khāṇḍavavanam agner yathāruci nivedya tṛptāgnito
GP12narsippu:2220_2: divyān varān avāpya suyodhanena hṛtarājyo dharmabhīmanakulasahadevadraupadīsahito
GP12narsippu:2220_3: virāṭanagare 'jñātavāsaṃ caritvā gograhe ca bhīṣmadroṇakṛpaduryodhanakarṇādīn jitvā
GP12narsippu:2220_4: samastagomaṇḍalaṃ nivartayitvā bhrātṛbhiḥ saha virāṭarājakṛtapūjo vāsudevasahitaḥ
GP12narsippu:2220_5: kurukṣetre dhārtarāṣṭrair bahubalair yuddhaṃ kurvan bhīṣmadroṇakṛpaśalyakarṇādibhir
GP12narsippu:2220_6: bhūriparākramaiḥ kṣatriyair nānādeśāgatair anekair api rājaputraiḥ saha duryodhanādīn
GP12narsippu:2220_7: dhārtarāṣṭrān hatvā svarājyaṃ prāpya dharmeṇa rājyaṃ paripālya bhrātṛbhiḥ saha mudito
GP12narsippu:2222: ḥyena bhāratayuddhe cakravyūhaṃ praviśyānekabhūbhujo nidhanaṃ prāpitāḥ || NsP_29.4 ||
GP12narsippu:2224: ḥso 'py abhiṣikto vanaṃ gacchatā dharmaputreṇa rājyaṃ kṛtvā rājaputro nākaṃ saṃprāpya reme || NsP_29.5 ||
GP12narsippu:2226: ḥyena brahmahatyāvāraṇārthaṃ mahābhārataṃ vyāsaśiṣyād vaiśaṃpāyanāt sādyantaṃ śrutam || NsP_29.6 ||
GP12narsippu:2227: ḥrājyaṃ ca dharmataḥ kṛtvā divam āruroha |
GP12narsippu:2229: ḥsa tu dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kurvan saṃsāraduḥkhād viraktaḥ śaunakopadeśena kriyāyogena sakalalokanāthaṃ viṣṇum ārādhya niṣkāmo vaiṣṇavaṃ padam avāpa |
GP12narsippu:2231: ḥsa tu bāla evābhiṣikto narasiṃhe 'tyantaṃ bhaktimān abhavat |
GP12narsippu:2234: ḥso 'pi rājyaṃ kṛtvā dharmato nārāyaṇam ārādhya tatpuram avāpa || NsP_29.10 ||
GP12narsippu:2236: ḥsa tu yathānyāyaṃ rājyaṃ kṛtvā divam avāpa |
GP12narsippu:2238: ḥsa ca rājyasthaḥ prajāḥ paripālya mlecchābhibhūte jagati jñānabalāt kalāpagrāmam āśritaḥ || NsP_29.12 ||
GP12narsippu:2239: yaḥ śraddadhānaḥ paṭhate śṛṇoti vā harau ca bhaktiṃ caritaṃ mahībhṛtām /
GP12narsippu:2240: sa saṃtatiṃ prāpya viśuddhakarmakṛd divaṃ samāsādya vasec ciraṃ sukhī // NsP_29.13 //
GP12narsippu:2241: || iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe śaṃtanusaṃtativarṇanaṃ nāma ekonatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ || NarP 29 ||
GP12narsippu:2245: saṃkṣepāt parvatākīrṇaṃ nadībhiś ca samantataḥ // NsP_30.1 //
GP12narsippu:2248: ḥlavaṇekṣurasasurāsarpirdadhidugdhasvacchodakasaṃjñaiḥ parasparaṃ dviguṇaiḥ saptasamudrair valayākārais te dvīpāḥ paridhiṣṭhitāḥ || NsP_30.2 ||
GP12narsippu:2249: ḥyo 'sau manuputraḥ priyavrato nāma sa saptadvīpādhipatir babhūva |
GP12narsippu:2250: ḥtasya agnīdhrādayo daśa putrā babhūvuḥ || NsP_30.3 ||
GP12narsippu:2253: ḥtatra jambudvīpādhipater agnīdhrasya nava putrāḥ jātāḥ || NsP_30.4 ||
GP12narsippu:2255: ramyo hiraṇyayaś caiva kurur bhadraś ca ketumān // NsP_30.5 //
GP12narsippu:2256: ḥnavavarṣāḥ vibhajya putrebhyaḥ pitrā dattā vanaṃ praviśatā |
GP12narsippu:2258: ḥyasyādhipatir nābheḥ ṛṣabhaḥ putro babhūva || NsP_30.6 ||
GP12narsippu:2259: ḥṛṣabhād bharato bharatena cirakālaṃ dharmeṇa pālitatvād idaṃ bhārataṃ varṣam abhūt |
GP12narsippu:2260: ḥilāvṛtasya madhye meruḥ suvarṇamayaś caturaśītisahasrāṇi yojanāni tasyocchrāyaḥ |
GP12narsippu:2271: ḥnavavarṣānvitaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ puṇyaparvataiḥ puṇyanadībhir anvitam || NsP_30.8 ||
GP12narsippu:2272: ḥkiṃpuruṣādīny aṣṭavarṣāṇi puṇyavatāṃ bhogasthānāni sākṣād bhāratavarṣam ekaṃ karmabhūmiś cāturvarṇyayutam || NsP_30.9 ||
GP12narsippu:2273: tatraiva karmabhiḥ svargaṃ kṛteḥ prāpsyanti mānavāḥ /
GP12narsippu:2275: adhogatim ito vipra yānti vai pāpakāriṇaḥ // NsP_30.10 //
GP12narsippu:2276: ḥye pāpakāriṇas tān viddhi pātālatale narake koṭisamanvitān || NsP_30.11 ||
GP12narsippu:2278: ḥmahendro malayaḥ śuktimān ṛṣyamūkaḥ sahyaparvato vindhyaḥ pāriyātraḥ |
GP12narsippu:2280: ḥnarmadā surasā ṛṣikulyā bhīmarathī kṛṣṇāveṇī candrabhāgā tāmraparṇī ity etāḥ sapta nadyaḥ |
GP12narsippu:2281: ḥgaṅgā yamunā godāvarī tuṅgabhadrā kāverī sarayūr ity etā mahānadyaḥ papaghnyaḥ || NsP_30.13 ||
GP12narsippu:2282: jambunāmnā ca vikhyātaṃ jambudvīpam idaṃ śubham /
GP12narsippu:2283: lakṣayojanavistīrṇam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tu bhāratam // NsP_30.14 //
GP12narsippu:2285: ḥniṣkāmā ye svadharmeṇa narasiṃhaṃ yajanti te tatra nivasanti |
GP12narsippu:2293: bhārate kṛtapuṇyānāṃ devānām api cālayam // NsP_30.18 //
GP12narsippu:2294: madhye pṛthivyām adrīndro bhāsvān merur hiraṇmayaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2298: tasya śṛṅgatrayaṃ mūrdhni svargo yatra pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2300: madhyamaṃ paścimaṃ pūrvaṃ meroḥ śṛṅgāṇi trīṇi vai /
GP12narsippu:2304: ucchritaṃ madhyamaṃ śṛṅgaṃ svargo yatra triviṣṭapaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2305: aprabhāntaritaṃ śṛṅgaṃ mūrdhni chatrākṛti sthitam // NsP_30.24 //
GP12narsippu:2307: triviṣṭapo nākapṛṣṭhe hy apsarāḥ santi nirvṛtāḥ // NsP_30.25 //
GP12narsippu:2308: ānando 'tha pramodaś ca svargaśṛṅge tu madhyame /
GP12narsippu:2309: śvetaś ca pauṣṭikaś caiva upaśobhanamanmathau // NsP_30.26 //
GP12narsippu:2310: āhlādaḥ svargarājā vai svargaśṛṅge tu paścime /
GP12narsippu:2313: ekaviṃśāni svargā vai niviṣṭā merumūrdhani // NsP_30.28 //
GP12narsippu:2315: tat teṣu nivasanti sma janāḥ krodhavivarjitāḥ // NsP_30.29 //
GP12narsippu:2317: bhṛguprapāte saukhyaṃ ca raṇaṃ caivāsya nirmalam // NsP_30.30 //
GP12narsippu:2318: anāśake tu saṃnyāse mṛto gacchet triviṣṭapam /
GP12narsippu:2319: ṛtuyājī nākapṛṣṭhaṃ agnihotrī ca nirvṛtim // NsP_30.31 //
GP12narsippu:2321: suvarṇadāyī saubhāgyaṃ labhan svargaṃ tapaḥ phalam // NsP_30.32 //
GP12narsippu:2325: bhūmidānena śuddhena labhate śāntikaṃ padam // NsP_30.34 //
GP12narsippu:2326: raupyadānena svargaṃ tu nirmalaṃ labhate naraḥ /
GP12narsippu:2328: dvijebhyas tarpaṇaṃ kṛtvā dattvā vastrāṇi bhaktitaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2329: śvetaṃ tu labhate svargaṃ yatra gatvā na śocate // NsP_30.36 //
GP12narsippu:2331: govṛṣasya pradānena svargaṃ manmathām āpnuyāt // NsP_30.37 //
GP12narsippu:2333: chatropānahadātā ca svargaṃ yāty upaśobhanam // NsP_30.38 //
GP12narsippu:2336: ekānnabhogī yo martyo naktabhogī ca nityaśaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2337: upavāsī trirātrādyaiḥ śāntaḥ svargaṃ śubhaṃ labhet // NsP_30.40 //
GP12narsippu:2341: yena yena hi bhāvena yad yad dānaṃ prayacchati /
GP12narsippu:2342: tat tat svargam avāpnoti yad yad icchati mānavaḥ // NsP_30.42 //
GP12narsippu:2343: catvāri atidānāni kanyā gaur bhūḥ sarasvatī /
GP12narsippu:2345: yas tu sarvāṇi dānāni brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayacchati /
GP12narsippu:2346: saṃprāpya na nivarteta svargaṃ śāntam anāmayam // NsP_30.44 //
GP12narsippu:2347: śṛṅge tu paścime yatra brahmā tatra sthitaḥ svayam /
GP12narsippu:2348: pūrvaśṛṅge svayaṃ viṣṇuḥ madhye caiva śivaḥ sthitaḥ // NsP_30.45 //
GP12narsippu:2349: ataḥ paraṃ tu viprendra svargādhvānam imaṃ śṛṇu /
GP12narsippu:2350: vimalaṃ vipulaṃ buddham upary upari saṃsthitaḥ // NsP_30.46 //
GP12narsippu:2351: prathame tu kumāras tu dvitīye mātaraḥ sthitaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2352: tṛtīye siddhagandharvās turye vidyādharā dvija // NsP_30.47 //
GP12narsippu:2353: pañcame nāgarājā ca ṣaṣṭhe tu vinatāsutaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2355: navame tu tathā dakṣa ādityo daśame pathi // NsP_30.48 //
GP12narsippu:2357: yojanānāṃ sahasre dve viṣṭambhanasamaṃ tataḥ // NsP_30.49 //
GP12narsippu:2361: madhyāhne tv amarāvatyāṃ yadā bhavati bhāskaraḥ /
GP12narsippu:2362: tadā saṃyamane yāmye tatrodyaṃs tu pradṛśyate // NsP_30.51 //
GP12narsippu:2363: meruṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kurvan bhāty eva savitā sadā /
GP12narsippu:2368: ko 'sau dhruvaḥ kasya sutaḥ sūryādhāro 'bhavat katham /
GP12narsippu:2369: vicintya kathayāśu tvaṃ sūta jīva samāḥ śatam // NsP_31.1 //
GP12narsippu:2372: tasya kṣitipater vipra dvau sutau saṃbabhūvatuḥ // NsP_31.2 //
GP12narsippu:2373: surucyām uttamo jyeṣṭhaḥ sunītyāṃ tu dhruvo 'paraḥ /
GP12narsippu:2378: dṛṣṭvottamaṃ tadutsaṅge niviṣṭaṃ janakasya vai // NsP_31.5 //
GP12narsippu:2380: ārurukṣum avekṣyāmuṃ surucir dhruvam abravīt // NsP_31.6 //
GP12narsippu:2382: daurbhageya kim āroḍhum iccher aṅkaṃ mahīpateḥ /
GP12narsippu:2384: asmin siṃhāsane sthātuṃ sukṛtaṃ kiṃ tvayā kṛtam // NsP_31.8 //
GP12narsippu:2385: yadi syāt sukṛtaṃ tat kiṃ durbhāgyodarago 'bhavaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2388: sukukṣijaṃ amuṃ paśya tvam uttamam anuttamam // NsP_31.10 //
GP12narsippu:2393: ucitaṃ nocitaṃ kiṃcin nocivān so 'pi pārthivaḥ // NsP_31.12 //
GP12narsippu:2396: śaiśavaiḥ sa śiśur natvā nṛpaṃ svasadanaṃ yayau /
GP12narsippu:2399: atha dṛṣṭvā sunītiṃ tu raho 'ntaḥpuravāsinīm // NsP_31.15 //
GP12narsippu:2400: āliṅgya dīrghaṃ niḥśvasya muktakaṇṭhaṃ ruroda ha /
GP12narsippu:2401: sāntvayitvā sunītis taṃ vadanaṃ parimārjya ca // NsP_31.16 //
GP12narsippu:2403: papraccha tanayaṃ mātā vada rodanakāraṇam // NsP_31.17 //
GP12narsippu:2406: saṃpṛcche janani tvāhaṃ saṃyak śaṃsa mamāgrataḥ // NsP_31.18cd //
GP12narsippu:2407: bhāryātve 'pi ca sāmānye kathaṃ sā suruciḥ priyā /
GP12narsippu:2408: kathaṃ na bhavatī mātaḥ priyā kṣitipater asi // NsP_31.19 //
GP12narsippu:2409: katham uttamatāṃ prāpta uttamaḥ suruceḥ sutaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2410: kumāratve 'pi sāmānye kathaṃ cāham anuttamaḥ // NsP_31.20 //
GP12narsippu:2411: kathaṃ tvaṃ mandabhāgyāsi sukukṣiḥ suruciḥ katham /
GP12narsippu:2412: kathaṃ nṛpāsanaṃ yogyam uttamasya kathaṃ na me // NsP_31.21 //
GP12narsippu:2413: kathaṃ me sukṛtaṃ tuccham uttamasyottamaṃ katham /
GP12narsippu:2414: iti śrutvā vacas tasya sunītir nītimacchiśoḥ // NsP_31.22 //
GP12narsippu:2419: nivedayāmi te sarvaṃ māvamāne matiṃ kṛthāḥ // NsP_31.24 //
GP12narsippu:2420: tayā yad uktaṃ tat sarvaṃ tathyam eva na cānyathā /
GP12narsippu:2421: yadi sā mahiṣī rājño rājñīnām ativallabhā // NsP_31.25 //
GP12narsippu:2424: ātapatraṃ ca candrābhaṃ śubhe cāpi hi cāmare /
GP12narsippu:2425: bhadrāsanaṃ tathoccaṃ ca sindhurāś ca madotkaṭāḥ // NsP_31.27 //
GP12narsippu:2427: niḥsapatnaṃ śubhaṃ rājyaṃ prāpyaṃ viṣṇuprasādataḥ // NsP_31.28 //
GP12narsippu:2429: ity ākarṇya sunītyās tan mātur vākyam aninditam /
GP12narsippu:2430: saunīteyo dhruvo vācam ādade vaktum uttaram // NsP_31.29 //
GP12narsippu:2432: janayitri sunīte me śṛṇu vākyam anākulam /
GP12narsippu:2433: uttānacaraṇād anyan nāstīti me matiḥ śubhe // NsP_31.30 //
GP12narsippu:2434: siddhārtho 'smy amba yady asti kaścid āśritakāmadhuk /
GP12narsippu:2435: adyaiva sakalārādhyaṃ tam ārādhya jagatpatim // NsP_31.31 //
GP12narsippu:2437: ekam eva hi sāhāyyaṃ mātar me kartum arhasi // NsP_31.32 //
GP12narsippu:2438: anujñāṃ dehi me viṣṇuṃ yathā cārādhayāmy aham // NsP_31.33ab //
GP12narsippu:2440: anujñātuṃ na śaknomi tvām uttānaśayāṅgaja // NsP_31.33cd //
GP12narsippu:2443: labdho 'si katibhiḥ kaṣṭhair iṣṭā saṃprārthya devatāḥ /
GP12narsippu:2444: yadā yadā bahir yāsi raṃtuṃ tricaturaṃ padam /
GP12narsippu:2445: tadā tadā mama prāṇas tāta tvām upagacchati // NsP_31.35 //
GP12narsippu:2447: adya yāvat pitā mātā tvaṃ cottānapado vibhuḥ /
GP12narsippu:2448: adyaprabhṛti me mātā pitā viṣṇur na śaṃśayaḥ // NsP_31.36 //
GP12narsippu:2450: viṣṇor ārādhane nāhaṃ vāraye tvāṃ suputraka /
GP12narsippu:2451: jihvā me śatadhā yāti yadi tvāṃ vārayāmi bhoḥ // NsP_31.37 //
GP12narsippu:2453: parikramya praṇamyātha tapase sa dhruvo yayau // NsP_31.38 //
GP12narsippu:2464: na veda kānanādhvānaṃ kṣaṇaṃ dadhyau nṛpātmajaḥ // NsP_31.43 //
GP12narsippu:2466: kiṃ karomi kva gacchāmi ko me sāhāyyado bhavet // NsP_31.44 //
GP12narsippu:2467: evam unmīlya nayane yāvat paśyati sa dhruvaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2468: tāvad dadarśa saptarṣīn atarkitagatīn vane // NsP_31.45 //
GP12narsippu:2474: dhruvo vijñāpayaṃ_cakre praṇamya lalitaṃ vacaḥ // NsP_31.48 //
GP12narsippu:2481: upopaveśya śiśukaṃ procus te vismitā bhṛśam /
GP12narsippu:2482: tavādyāpi na jānīmo vatsa nirvedakāraṇam // NsP_31.51 //
GP12narsippu:2484: saptadvīpapate rājñaḥ kumāras tvaṃ tathā katham // NsP_31.52 //
GP12narsippu:2485: kim asmābhir aho kāryaṃ kas tavāsti manorathaḥ // NsP_31.53ab //
GP12narsippu:2487: munayo mama yo bandhur uttamaś cottamottamaḥ // NsP_31.53cd //
GP12narsippu:2488: pitrā pradattaṃ tasyāstu tad bhadrāsanam uttamam /
GP12narsippu:2489: bhavatkṛtaṃ hi sāhāyyaṃ etad icchāmi suvratāḥ // NsP_31.54 //
GP12narsippu:2491: indrādiduravāpaṃ yat kathaṃ labhyeta tat padam // NsP_31.55 //
GP12narsippu:2492: iti śrutvā vacas tasya munayo bālakasya tu /
GP12narsippu:2493: yathārtham eva pratyūcur marīcyādyās tadā dhruvam // NsP_31.56 //
GP12narsippu:2501: na hi dūre padaṃ tasya sarvāsāṃ saṃpadām iha /
GP12narsippu:2505: paramāntakam āpnoti sa viṣṇuḥ sarvado dhruva // NsP_31.60 //
GP12narsippu:2507: yad āhuḥ paramaṃ brahma pradhānapuruṣāt param /
GP12narsippu:2508: yanmāyayā kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ sa viṣṇu kīrtito 'rthadaḥ // NsP_31.61 //
GP12narsippu:2511: antarātmāsya jagataḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ kiṃ na yacchati // NsP_31.62 //
GP12narsippu:2514: tam ārādhya hṛṣīkeśaṃ caturvargo na dūrataḥ // NsP_31.63 //
GP12narsippu:2516: satyam uktaṃ dvijendrā vo viṣṇor ārādhanaṃ prati /
GP12narsippu:2517: kathaṃ sa bhagavān ijyaḥ sa vidhiś copadiśyatām // NsP_31.64 //
GP12narsippu:2518: prabhūtado bhaved yo vai durārādhyatamo bhavet /
GP12narsippu:2519: bālo 'haṃ rājaputro 'haṃ duḥkhaṃ naiva mayā kṣamam // NsP_31.65 //
GP12narsippu:2521: tiṣṭhatā gacchatā vāpi svapatā jāgratā tathā /
GP12narsippu:2524: vāsudevaṃ japan martyaḥ sarvaṃ prāpnoty asaṃśayam // NsP_31.67 //
GP12narsippu:2526: dhyāyaṃś caturbhujaṃ viṣṇuṃ japtvā siddhiṃ na ko gataḥ // NsP_31.68 //
GP12narsippu:2529: tvam apy etena mantreṇa vāsudevaparo bhava /
GP12narsippu:2530: yathābhilaṣitām ṛddhiṃ kṣipraṃ prāpsyasi sattama // NsP_31.70 //
GP12narsippu:2533: vāsudevamanā bhūtvā dhruvo 'pi tapase yayau // NsP_31.71 //
GP12narsippu:2534: dhruvaḥ sarvārthadaṃ mantraṃ japan madhuvane tapaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2535: sa cakre yamunātīre munidiṣṭena vartmanā // NsP_31.72 //
GP12narsippu:2536: śraddhānvitena japatā ca tapaḥprabhāvāt sākṣād ivābjanayanaṃ dadṛśe hṛdīśam /
GP12narsippu:2537: divyākṛtiṃ sapadi tena tataḥ sa eva harṣāt punaḥ sa prajajāpa nṛpātmabhūtaḥ // NsP_31.73 //
GP12narsippu:2539: magne manasy anupameyasukhāmburāśau rājñaḥ śiśur na ca viveda śarīravārtām // NsP_31.74 //
GP12narsippu:2540: vighnāś ca tasya kila śaṅkitadevasṛṣṭā bālasya tīvratapaso viphalā babhūvuḥ /
GP12narsippu:2541: śītātapādir iva viṣṇumayaṃ muniṃ hi prādeśikā na khalu dharṣayituṃ kṣamante // NsP_31.75 //
GP12narsippu:2542: atha bhaktajanapriyaḥ prabhuḥ śiśunā dhyānabalena toṣitaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2543: varadaḥ patagendravāhano harir āgāt svajanaṃ tam īkṣitum // NsP_31.76 //
GP12narsippu:2545: sa babhāv udayādrimatsarād dhṛtabālārka ivāsitācalaḥ // NsP_31.77 //
GP12narsippu:2546: sa rājasūnuṃ tapasi sthitaṃ taṃ dhruvaṃ dhruvasnigdhadṛg ity uvāca /
GP12narsippu:2547: dantāṃśusaṃjñair amitapravāhaiḥ prakṣālayan reṇum ivāsya gātre // NsP_31.78 //
GP12narsippu:2548: varaṃ varaṃ vatsa vṛṇīṣva yas te manogatas tvattapasāsmi tuṣṭaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2549: dhyānena te cendriyanigraheṇa manonirodhena ca duṣkareṇa // NsP_31.79 //
GP12narsippu:2550: śṛṇvan vacas tat sakalaṃ gambhīram unmīlitākṣaḥ sahasā dadarśa /
GP12narsippu:2551: sve cintyamānaṃ tv idam eva mūrtaṃ puraḥsthitaṃ brahma caturbhujaṃ saḥ // NsP_31.80 //
GP12narsippu:2552: dṛṣṭvā kṣaṇaṃ rājasutaḥ supūjyaṃ puras trayīśaṃ kim iha bravīmi /
GP12narsippu:2553: kiṃ vā karomīti sasaṃbhramaḥ sa tu na cābravīt kiṃcana no cakāra // NsP_31.81 //
GP12narsippu:2555: daṇḍapraṇāmāya papāta bhūmau pravepamānabhru hareḥ puraḥ sa hi // NsP_31.82 //
GP12narsippu:2557: roroda harṣeṇa ciraṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ jagato gurum // NsP_31.83 //
GP12narsippu:2559: anyaiḥ sanatkumārādyair yogibhir yogināṃ varam // NsP_31.84 //
GP12narsippu:2561: dhruvam utthāpayāṃ_cakre cakrī dhṛtvā kareṇa tam // NsP_31.85 //
GP12narsippu:2563: karābhyāṃ komalābhyāṃ sa pariṣvajyāha taṃ hariḥ // NsP_31.86 //
GP12narsippu:2564: varaṃ varaya bho bāla yat te manasi vartate /
GP12narsippu:2565: tad dadāmi na saṃdeho nādeyaṃ vidyate tava // NsP_31.87 //
GP12narsippu:2566: tato varaṃ rājaśiśur yayāce viṣṇuṃ varaṃ te stavaśaktim eva /
GP12narsippu:2567: taṃ mūrtivijñānanibhena devaḥ pasparśa śaṅkhena mukhe 'malena // NsP_31.88 //
GP12narsippu:2568: atha suramunidattajñānacandreṇa samyag vimalitam iva cittaṃ pūrṇam eva dhruvasya /
GP12narsippu:2569: tribhuvanaguruśaṅkhasparśajajñānabhānān udayati nitarāntaḥ sādhu tuṣṭāva hṛṣṭaḥ // NsP_31.89 //
GP12narsippu:2601: ḥkundanibhaśaṅkhadharam indunibhavaktraṃ sundarasudarśanam udāratarahāsaṃ vidvajjanavanditam idaṃ ye rūpam atihṛdyam akhileśvaraṃ nato 'smi |
GP12narsippu:2602: sthānābhikāmī tapasi sthito 'ham tvāṃ dṛṣṭavān sādhumunīndraguhyam /
GP12narsippu:2603: kācaṃ vicinvann iva divyaratnaṃ svāmin kṛtārtho 'smi varān na yāci // NsP_31.90 //
GP12narsippu:2604: apūrvadṛṣṭe tava pādapadme dṛṣṭvā dṛḍhaṃ nātha na hi tyajāmi /
GP12narsippu:2605: kāmān na yāce sa hi ko 'pi mūḍho yaḥ kalpavṛkṣāt tuṣamātram icchet // NsP_31.91 //
GP12narsippu:2606: tvāṃ mokṣabījaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapannaḥ śaknomi bhoktuṃ na bahiḥsukhāni /
GP12narsippu:2607: ratnākare deva sati svanāthe vibhūṣaṇaṃ kācamayaṃ na yuktam // NsP_31.92 //
GP12narsippu:2608: ato na yāce varam īśa yuṣmat pādābjabhaktiṃ satataṃ mamāstu /
GP12narsippu:2609: imaṃ varaṃ devavara prayaccha punaḥ punas tvām idam eva yāce // NsP_31.93 //
GP12narsippu:2611: ity ātmasaṃdarśanalabdhadivya- jñānaṃ gadantaṃ bhagavāñ jagāda // NsP_31.94 //
GP12narsippu:2613: ārādhya viṣṇuṃ kim anena labdhaṃ mā bhūñjane 'pīttham asādhuvādaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2614: sthānaṃ paraṃ prāpnuhi yan mataṃ te kālena māṃ prāpsyasi śuddhabhāvaḥ // NsP_31.95 //
GP12narsippu:2615: ādhārabhūtaḥ sakalagrahāṇāṃ kalpadrumaḥ sarvajanaiś ca vandyaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2616: mama prasādāt tava sā ca mātā mamāntike yā ca sunītir āryā // NsP_31.96 //
GP12narsippu:2618: taṃ sādhayitveti varair mukundaḥ svam ālayaṃ dṛśyavapur jagāma /
GP12narsippu:2619: tyaktvā śanair divyavapuḥ svabhaktaṃ muhuḥ parāvṛttya samīkṣamāṇaḥ // NsP_31.97 //
GP12narsippu:2620: tāvac ca sadyaḥ surasiddhasaṅghaḥ śrīviṣṇutadbhaktasamāgamaṃ tam /
GP12narsippu:2621: dṛṣṭvātha varṣan surapuṣpavṛṣṭiṃ tuṣṭāva harṣād dhruvam avyayaṃ ca // NsP_31.98 //
GP12narsippu:2622: śriyābhimatyā ca sunītisūnur vibhāti devair api vandyamānaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2623: yo 'yaṃ nṛṇāṃ kīrtanadarśanābhyām āyur yaśo vardhayati śriyaṃ ca // NsP_31.99 //
GP12narsippu:2624: itthaṃ dhruvaḥ prāpa padaṃ durāpaṃ hareḥ prasādān na ca citram etat /
GP12narsippu:2625: tasmin prasanne dvijarājapatre na durlabhaṃ bhaktajaneṣu kiṃcit // NsP_31.100 //
GP12narsippu:2627: pūrṇe śatasahasre dve tasmān nakṣatramaṇḍalam // NsP_31.101 //
GP12narsippu:2629: tāvatpramāṇabhāge tu budhasyāpy uśanā sthitaḥ // NsP_31.102 //
GP12narsippu:2631: lakṣadvayaṃ tu bhaumasya sthito devapurohitaḥ // NsP_31.103 //
GP12narsippu:2632: saurir bṛhaspateś cordhvaṃ dvilakṣe tu vyavasthitaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2633: tasmāc chanaiścarād ūrdhvaṃ lakṣe saptarṣimaṇḍalam // NsP_31.104 //
GP12narsippu:2634: saptarṣimaṇḍalād ūrdhvam ekaṃ lakṣaṃ dhruvaḥ sthitaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2636: svabhāvāt tapati viprendra adhaś cordhvaṃ ca raśmibhiḥ /
GP12narsippu:2637: kālasaṃkhyāṃ trilokasya sa karoti yuge yuge // NsP_31.106 //
GP12narsippu:2638: janas tapas tathā satyam etāṃl lokān dvijottama /
GP12narsippu:2641: adhogataiś ca bhūrlokaṃ dyotate dīrghadīdhitiḥ // NsP_31.108 //
GP12narsippu:2643: chatravat pratipaśyeta maṇḍalān maṇḍalaṃ param // NsP_31.109 //
GP12narsippu:2646: lokapālaiḥ sa sahito lokān rakṣati dharmataḥ /
GP12narsippu:2647: vaset svarge mahābhāga devendraḥ sa tu kīrtimān // NsP_31.111 //
GP12narsippu:2648: tato 'dhastān mune cedaṃ pātālaṃ viddhi saprabham /
GP12narsippu:2649: na tatra tapate sūryo na rātrir na niśākaraḥ // NsP_31.112 //
GP12narsippu:2653: tato yojanamātreṇa dviguṇo maṇḍalena tu // NsP_31.114 //
GP12narsippu:2655: tatropari tapolokaś caturbhiḥ koṭibhiḥ sthitaḥ // NsP_31.115 //
GP12narsippu:2659: vārāhe tasya māhātmyaṃ kathitaṃ lokacintakaiḥ // NsP_31.117 //
GP12narsippu:2661: brahmāṇḍāt paramaḥ sākṣān nirlepaḥ puruṣaḥ sthitaḥ // NsP_31.118 //
GP12narsippu:2663: iti te saṃsthitiḥ proktā bhūgolasya mayānagha /
GP12narsippu:2664: yas tu samyag imāṃ vetti sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // NsP_31.119 //
GP12narsippu:2666: yuge yuge viṣṇur anādimūrtimān āsthāya viśvaṃ paripāti duṣṭahā // NsP_31.120 //
GP12narsippu:2671: sāṃprataṃ śrotum icchāmi tan me vada mahāmate // NsP_32.1 //
GP12narsippu:2673: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi caritaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ /
GP12narsippu:2674: sahasrānīkasya harer avatārāṃś ca me śṛṇu // NsP_32.2 //
GP12narsippu:2676: pālayām_asa dharmeṇa rājyaṃ sa tu nṛpātmajaḥ // NsP_32.3 //
GP12narsippu:2678: bhaktir babhūva deveśe narasiṃhe surottame // NsP_32.4 //
GP12narsippu:2679: taṃ draṣṭum āgataḥ sākṣād viṣṇubhaktaṃ bhṛguḥ purā /
GP12narsippu:2680: arghyapādyāsanai rājā tam abhyarcyābravīd idam // NsP_32.5 //
GP12narsippu:2682: tvaddarśanam apuṇyānāṃ kalāv asmin sudurlabham // NsP_32.6 //
GP12narsippu:2684: ārādhayitum icchāmi vidhānaṃ tatra me vada // NsP_32.7 //
GP12narsippu:2686: śrotum icchāmi sakalāṃs tān puṇyān api me vada // NsP_32.8 //
GP12narsippu:2688: śṛṇu bhūpālaputra tvaṃ na hi kaścit kalau yuge /
GP12narsippu:2689: harau bhaktiṃ karoty atra nṛsiṃhe cātibhaktimān // NsP_32.9 //
GP12narsippu:2690: svabhāvād yasya bhaktiḥ syān narasiṃhe surottame /
GP12narsippu:2691: tasyārayaḥ praṇaśyanti kāryasiddhiś ca jāyate // NsP_32.10 //
GP12narsippu:2692: tvam atīva harer bhaktaḥ pāṇḍuvaṃśe 'pi sattamaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2693: tena te nikhilaṃ vakṣye śṛṇuṣvaikāgramānasaḥ // NsP_32.11 //
GP12narsippu:2694: yaḥ kuryāc chobhanaṃ veśma narasiṃhasya bhaktimān /
GP12narsippu:2700: narasiṃhaṃ pratiṣṭhapya yaḥ pūjām ācaren naraḥ /
GP12narsippu:2701: tasya kāmāḥ prasidhyanti paramaṃ padam āpnuyāt // NsP_32.15 //
GP12narsippu:2702: brahmādayaḥ surāḥ sarve viṣṇum ārādhya te purā /
GP12narsippu:2703: svaṃ svaṃ padam anuprāptāḥ keśavasya prasādataḥ // NsP_32.16 //
GP12narsippu:2704: ye ye nṛpavarā rājan māndhātṛpramukhā nṛpāḥ /
GP12narsippu:2705: te te viṣṇuṃ samārādhya svargalokam ito gatāḥ // NsP_32.17 //
GP12narsippu:2706: yas tu pūjayate nityaṃ narasiṃhaṃ sureśvaram /
GP12narsippu:2707: sa svargamokṣabhāgī syān nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // NsP_32.18 //
GP12narsippu:2710: vidhivat sthāpayed yas tu kārayitvā janārdanam /
GP12narsippu:2711: na tu nirgamanaṃ tasya viṣṇulokād bhaven nṛpa // NsP_32.20 //
GP12narsippu:2712: naro nṛsiṃhaṃ tam anantavikramaṃ surāsurair arcitapādapaṅkajam /
GP12narsippu:2713: saṃsthāpya bhaktyā vidhivac ca pūjayet payāti sākṣāt parameśvaraṃ harim // NsP_32.21 //
GP12narsippu:2717: harer arcāvidhiṃ puṇyāṃ śrotum icchāmi sattvataḥ /
GP12narsippu:2718: tvatprasādād viśeṣeṇa bhagavan prabravīhi me // NsP_33.1 //
GP12narsippu:2720: yat puṇyaṃ labhate tadvad upalepanakṛṇ naraḥ // NsP_33.2 //
GP12narsippu:2721: śuddhodakena yat puṇyaṃ snāpite keśave bhavet /
GP12narsippu:2722: kṣīrasnānena yat puṇyaṃ dadhnā ca madhunā tathā /
GP12narsippu:2723: ghṛtasnānena yat puṇyaṃ pañcagavyena yad bhavet // NsP_33.3 //
GP12narsippu:2727: mantreṇa snāpite yac ca vastradānena yad bhavet // NsP_33.5 //
GP12narsippu:2728: śrīkhaṇḍakuṅkumābhyāṃ tu arcite kiṃ phalaṃ bhavet /
GP12narsippu:2729: puṣpair abhyarcite yac ca yat phalaṃ dhūpadīpayoḥ // NsP_33.6 //
GP12narsippu:2730: naivedyair yat phalaṃ proktaṃ pradakṣiṇakṛte tu yat /
GP12narsippu:2731: namaskārakṛte yac ca phalaṃ yas stotragītayoḥ // NsP_33.7 //
GP12narsippu:2733: dhvajapradāne yad viṣṇoḥ śaṅkhadānena yad bhavet // NsP_33.8 //
GP12narsippu:2734: etac cānyac ca yat kiṃcid ajñānān na pracoditam /
GP12narsippu:2735: tat sarvaṃ kathaya brahman bhaktasya mama keśave // NsP_33.9 //
GP12narsippu:2737: iti saṃprerito vipras tena rājñā bhṛgus tadā /
GP12narsippu:2738: mārkaṇḍeyaṃ niyujyātha kathane sa gato muniḥ // NsP_33.10 //
GP12narsippu:2740: rājñe pravaktum ārebhe bhṛguṇā codito muniḥ // NsP_33.11 //
GP12narsippu:2744: narasiṃhasya nityaṃ ca yaḥ saṃmārjanam ārabhet /
GP12narsippu:2746: gomayena mṛdā toyair yaḥ karoty upalepanam /
GP12narsippu:2747: sa cākṣayaphalaṃ prāpya viṣṇuloke mahīyate // NsP_33.14 //
GP12narsippu:2749: yac chrutvā sarvapāpebhyo muktir bhavati sattama // NsP_33.15 //
GP12narsippu:2750: purā yudhiṣṭhiro rājā pañcabhir bhrātṛbhir yutaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2751: draupadyā saha rājendra kānanaṃ vicacāra ha // NsP_33.16 //
GP12narsippu:2753: nārado 'pi gato nākaṃ juṣṭvedaṃ tīrtham uttamam // NsP_33.17 //
GP12narsippu:2754: tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā prasthitas tīrtham uttamam /
GP12narsippu:2757: dānavo bahuromā ca tathā sthūlaśirā nṛpa // NsP_33.19 //
GP12narsippu:2759: kṛtvā bhūpa mune rupaṃ bahuromā gatas tadā // NsP_33.20 //
GP12narsippu:2761: bibhrat kamaṇḍaluṃ pārśve darbhasūcīṃ tathā kare // NsP_33.21 //
GP12narsippu:2763: sa dṛṣṭaḥ pāṇḍavais tatra revāyāṃ vanacāribhiḥ // NsP_33.22 //
GP12narsippu:2764: tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā taṃ praṇamya sahānujaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2765: jagāda vacanaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhāgyenāsi mahāmune // NsP_33.23 //
GP12narsippu:2767: munīnāṃ darśanaṃ nātha śrutaṃ dharmopadeśakam // NsP_33.24 //
GP12narsippu:2770: jalpann ity āturaṃ vākyaṃ ko nāmāsty atra rakṣakaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2771: bhayāturaṃ naro jīvaṃ yo rakṣec charaṇāgatam // NsP_33.26 //
GP12narsippu:2772: tasyānantaphalaṃ syād vai kiṃ punar māṃ dvijottamam /
GP12narsippu:2775: dvijaṃ dhenuṃ striyaṃ bālaṃ piḍyamānaṃ ca durjanaiḥ // NsP_33.28 //
GP12narsippu:2776: upekṣeta naro yas tu sa ca gacchati rauravam /
GP12narsippu:2778: ko rakṣati naro vīraḥ parābhūtaṃ hi dānavaiḥ /
GP12narsippu:2779: gṛhītvā cākṣamālāṃ me tathā subhakamaṇḍalum // NsP_33.30 //
GP12narsippu:2781: gṛhītaṃ mama sarvasvaṃ dānavena durātmanā // NsP_33.31 //
GP12narsippu:2782: ity ākarṇya vacaḥ klībaṃ pāṇḍavā jātasaṃbhramāḥ /
GP12narsippu:2783: yānti romāñcitā bhūyo vidhāyāgniṃ ca taṃ munim // NsP_33.32 //
GP12narsippu:2784: vimucya draupadīṃ tatra muneḥ pārśve mahātmanaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2785: tato dūrataraṃ prāptāḥ saṃrambhāt te ca pāṇḍavāḥ // NsP_33.33 //
GP12narsippu:2786: tato yudhiṣṭhiro 'vocat kiṃ ca no nātra dṛśyate /
GP12narsippu:2789: tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā satyāṃ vācam akalpayat // NsP_33.35 //
GP12narsippu:2790: nirīkṣya maṇḍalaṃ bhānos tadā sugahane vane /
GP12narsippu:2791: mama satyāc ca sukṛtād dharmasaṃbhāṣaṇāt prabho // NsP_33.36 //
GP12narsippu:2795: nāsāv upadrutaḥ kena māyaiṣāsya durātmanaḥ // NsP_33.38 //
GP12narsippu:2796: tato bhīmaḥ karāghātair naśyamānaṃ hi dānavam /
GP12narsippu:2797: saṃrambhāt kupito 'tyarthaṃ maulideśe jaghāna tam // NsP_33.39 //
GP12narsippu:2798: so 'pi rūpaṃ nijaṃ prāpya raudraṃ bhīmam atāḍayat /
GP12narsippu:2799: tatra yuddhaṃ pravavṛte dāruṇaṃ bhīmadaityayoḥ // NsP_33.40 //
GP12narsippu:2800: kaṣṭād babhañja bhīmo 'pi tasya sthūlaṃ śiro vane /
GP12narsippu:2801: arjuno 'pi samāyāto naiva paśyati taṃ munim // NsP_33.41 //
GP12narsippu:2802: tathā ca draupadīṃ bhūyaḥ sādhvīṃ kāntāṃ ca vallabhām /
GP12narsippu:2803: tato vṛkṣaṃ samāruhya yāvat paśyati cārjunaḥ // NsP_33.42 //
GP12narsippu:2804: tāvad vidhāya tāṃ skandhe śīghraṃ dhāvati dānavaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2805: saṃhṛtā yāti duṣṭena rudatī kurarī yathā // NsP_33.43 //
GP12narsippu:2807: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā sa yayau vīraḥ śabdair saṃnādayan diśaḥ // NsP_33.44 //
GP12narsippu:2809: tato daityo 'pi tāṃ tanvīṃ vihāyāśu palāyitaḥ // NsP_33.45 //
GP12narsippu:2810: tathāpi cārjuno tasya kopān muñcati nāsuram /
GP12narsippu:2811: patito medinīpṛṣṭhe tāvad eva caturbhujaḥ // NsP_33.46 //
GP12narsippu:2813: tataḥ sa vismayākrānto natvā pārtho vaco 'vadat // NsP_33.47 //
GP12narsippu:2815: kathaṃ kṛtaiṣā bhagavaṃs tvayā māyātra vaiṣṇavī /
GP12narsippu:2816: mayāpy apakṛtaṃ nātha tat kṣamasva namo 'stu te // NsP_33.48 //
GP12narsippu:2818: tat kṣantavyaṃ jagannātha caitanyaṃ mānave kutaḥ // NsP_33.49 //
GP12narsippu:2823: bahuroman purvajātiṃ karma me śaṃsa tattvataḥ /
GP12narsippu:2824: kena karmavipākena viṣṇoḥ sārūpyam āptavān // NsP_33.51 //
GP12narsippu:2826: śṛṇv arjuna mahābhāga sahito bhrātṛbhir mama /
GP12narsippu:2827: caritaṃ citram atyarthaṃ śṛṇvatāṃ mudavardhanam // NsP_33.52 //
GP12narsippu:2833: mama taccaritaṃ dṛṣṭvā vipro vismayam āgataḥ // NsP_33.55 //
GP12narsippu:2840: tan me vada mahābhāga tvayā kiṃ viditaṃ phalam // NsP_33.58 //
GP12narsippu:2841: karmāṇy anyāni santy eva viṣṇoḥ priyatarāṇi vai /
GP12narsippu:2842: tathāpi tvaṃ mahābhāga etayoḥ satatodyataḥ // NsP_33.59 //
GP12narsippu:2844: tad brūhi yady aguhyaṃ ca prītir mayi tavāsti cet // NsP_33.60 //
GP12narsippu:2846: śṛṇuṣva vipraśārdūla mamaiva caritaṃ purā // NsP_33.61 //
GP12narsippu:2848: pūrvajanmani viprendra raivato nāma vāḍavaḥ // NsP_33.62 //
GP12narsippu:2850: piśuno niṣṭhuraś caiva apaṇyanāṃ ca vikrayī // NsP_33.63 //
GP12narsippu:2857: śūnyaṃ pūjādibhir viṣṇor mandiraṃ prāptavān niśi /
GP12narsippu:2858: svavastraprāntato brahman kiyadaṃśaḥ sa mārjitaḥ // NsP_33.67 //
GP12narsippu:2860: tenāpi mama duṣkarma niḥśeṣaṃ kṣayam āgatam // NsP_33.68 //
GP12narsippu:2861: evaṃ sthitaṃ viṣṇugṛhe mayā bhogecchayā dvija /
GP12narsippu:2862: tadaiva dīpakaṃ dṛṣṭvā āgatāḥ purapālakāḥ // NsP_33.69 //
GP12narsippu:2863: cauryārthaṃ paradūto 'yam ity uktvā mām apātayan /
GP12narsippu:2864: khaḍgena tīkṣṇadhāreṇa śiraś chittvā ca te gatāḥ // NsP_33.70 //
GP12narsippu:2866: gandharvair gīyamāno 'haṃ svargalokaṃ tadā gataḥ // NsP_33.71 //
GP12narsippu:2868: tatra sthitvā brahmakalpaṃ śataṃ sāgraṃ dvijottamāḥ /
GP12narsippu:2871: jayadhvaja iti khyāto rājā rājīvalocanaḥ // NsP_33.73 //
GP12narsippu:2873: indralokam anuprāpya rudralokaṃ tato gataḥ // NsP_33.74 //
GP12narsippu:2875: dṛṣṭaś ca namito naiva garvān me hasitaś ca saḥ // NsP_33.75 //
GP12narsippu:2876: kupitaḥ śaptavān māṃ sa rākṣaso bhava bhūpate /
GP12narsippu:2877: iti śāpaṃ samākarṇya dattaṃ tena dvijanmanā // NsP_33.76 //
GP12narsippu:2878: prasādito mayā bhūpa prasādaṃ kṛtavān muniḥ /
GP12narsippu:2879: yadā revāmaṭhe rājan dharmaputrasya dhīmataḥ // NsP_33.77 //
GP12narsippu:2881: so 'ham arjuna bhūpāla dharmaputra yudhiṣṭhira // NsP_33.78 //
GP12narsippu:2882: viṣṇoḥ sārūpyam agamaṃ yāmi vaikuṇṭham adya vai // NsP_33.79ab //
GP12narsippu:2884: ity uktvā garuḍārūḍho dharmaputrasya paśyataḥ // NsP_33.79cd //
GP12narsippu:2885: gatavān viṣṇubhavanaṃ yatra viṣṇuḥ śriyā saha /
GP12narsippu:2887: avaśenāpi yat karma kṛtvemāṃ śriyam āgataḥ /
GP12narsippu:2888: bhaktimadbhiḥ praśāntaiś ca kiṃ punaḥ samyagarcanāt // NsP_33.81 //
GP12narsippu:2894: arcayadhvaṃ jagannāthaṃ bhūyo bhūyo vadāmy aham /
GP12narsippu:2895: tartuṃ yadīcchatha dvijā dustaraṃ bhavasāgaram // NsP_33.84 //
GP12narsippu:2897: te vandyās te prapūjyāś ca namasyāś ca viśeṣataḥ // NsP_33.85 //
GP12narsippu:2899: iti śrīnarasimhapurāṇe sahasrānīkacarite mārkaṇḍeyenopadiṣṭasaṃmārjanopalepaphalaṃ nāma trayastriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ || NarP 33 ||
GP12narsippu:2903: nirmālyāpanayād viṣṇor yat puṇyaṃ tad vadasva me // NsP_34.1 //
GP12narsippu:2908: śrīviṣṇoḥ sadanaṃ prāpya modate kālam akṣayam // NsP_34.3 //
GP12narsippu:2915: snāpya dadhnā sakṛd yas tu nirmalaḥ priyadarśanaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2917: yaḥ karoti harer arcāṃ madhunā snāpayan naraḥ /
GP12narsippu:2918: agniloke sa moditvā punar viṣṇupure vaset // NsP_34.8 //
GP12narsippu:2919: ghṛtena snapanaṃ yas tu snānakāle viśeṣataḥ /
GP12narsippu:2921: pāpakañcukam unmucya yathā jīrṇam ahis tvacam /
GP12narsippu:2922: divyaṃ vimānam āsthāya viṣṇuloke mahīyate // NsP_34.10 //
GP12narsippu:2924: mantrapūrvaṃ mahārāja tasya puṇyam anantakam // NsP_34.11 //
GP12narsippu:2925: yaś ca godhūmakaiś cūrṇair udvartyoṣṇena vāriṇā /
GP12narsippu:2926: prakṣālya devadeveśaṃ vāruṇaṃ lokam āpnuyāt // NsP_34.12 //
GP12narsippu:2927: pādapīṭhaṃ tu yo bhaktyā bilvapatrar nirgharṣitam /
GP12narsippu:2928: uṣṇāmbunā ca prakṣālya sarvapāpair pramucyate // NsP_34.13 //
GP12narsippu:2932: indraloke sa moditvā paścād viṣṇupure vaset /
GP12narsippu:2933: puṇyodakena govindaṃ snāpya bhaktyā narottama // NsP_34.15 //
GP12narsippu:2935: vastrābhyām arcanaṃ bhaktyā paridhāpya hariṃ hareḥ // NsP_34.16 //
GP12narsippu:2938: ālipya bhaktyā rājendra kalpakoṭiṃ vased divi /
GP12narsippu:2942: etair anyaiś ca kusumaiḥ praśastair acyutaṃ naraḥ /
GP12narsippu:2943: arcayed daśasuvarṇasya pratyekaṃ phalam āpnuyāt // NsP_34.20 //
GP12narsippu:2944: mālāṃ kṛtvā yathālābham eteṣāṃ viṣṇum arcayet /
GP12narsippu:2946: divyāṃ vimānam āsthāya viṣṇuloke sa modate /
GP12narsippu:2947: narasiṃhaṃ tu yo bhaktyā bilvapatrair akhaṇḍitaiḥ // NsP_34.22 //
GP12narsippu:2948: niśchidraiḥ pūjayed yas tu tulasībhiḥ samanvitam /
GP12narsippu:2951: māhiṣākhyaṃ guggulaṃ ca ājyayuktaṃ saśarkaram // NsP_34.24 //
GP12narsippu:2955: vāyuloke sa moditvā paścād viṣṇupuraṃ vrajet // NsP_34.26 //
GP12narsippu:2956: ghṛtena vātha tailena dīpaṃ prajvālayen naraḥ /
GP12narsippu:2957: viṣṇave vidhivad bhaktyā tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu // NsP_34.27 //
GP12narsippu:2959: jyotiṣmatā vimānena viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // NsP_34.28 //
GP12narsippu:2961: nivedya narasiṃhāya yāvakaṃ pāyasaṃ tathā // NsP_34.29 //
GP12narsippu:2963: viṣṇuloke mahābhogān bhuñjann āste sa vaiṣṇavaḥ // NsP_34.30 //
GP12narsippu:2965: śāntiṃ tasya prayacchanti śriyam ārogyam eva ca // NsP_34.31 //
GP12narsippu:2967: kṛtena yat phalaṃ nṝṇāṃ tac chṛṇuṣva nṛpātmaja // NsP_34.32 //
GP12narsippu:2969: namaskāraḥ kṛto yena bhaktyā vai mādhavasya ca // NsP_34.33 //
GP12narsippu:2971: stotrair japaiś ca devāgre yaḥ stauti madhusūdanam // NsP_34.34 //
GP12narsippu:2974: yaḥ kārayati vai viṣṇoḥ sa yāti mandiraṃ naraḥ /
GP12narsippu:2979: dhvajaṃ tu viṣṇave yas tu garuḍena samanvitam // NsP_34.38 //
GP12narsippu:2983: mukuṭābharaṇādyaiś ca yo viṣṇuṃ pūjayen nṛpa // NsP_34.40 //
GP12narsippu:2985: indraloke vased dhīmān yāvad indrāś caturdaśa // NsP_34.41 //
GP12narsippu:2986: yo gāṃ payasvinīṃ viṣṇoḥ kapilāṃ saṃprayacchati /
GP12narsippu:2987: ārādhya tam athāgre tu yat kiṃcid dagdham uttamam // NsP_34.42 //
GP12narsippu:2989: pitaras tasya modante śvetadvīpe ciraṃ nṛpa // NsP_34.43 //
GP12narsippu:2990: evaṃ yaḥ pūjayed rājan narasiṃhaṃ narottamaḥ /
GP12narsippu:2991: tasya svargāpavargau tu bhavato nātra saṃśayaḥ // NsP_34.44 //
GP12narsippu:2992: yatraivaṃ pūjyate viṣṇur narasiṃho narair nṛpa /
GP12narsippu:2993: na tatra vyādhidurbhikṣa- rājacaurādikaṃ bhayam // NsP_34.45 //
GP12narsippu:2995: nānāsvargasukhaṃ bhuktvā na bhūyaḥ stanapo bhavet // NsP_34.46 //
GP12narsippu:2996: nityaṃ sarpis tilair homo grāme yasmin pravartate /
GP12narsippu:2997: na bhavet tasya grāmasya bhayaṃ vā tatra kutracit // NsP_34.47 //
GP12narsippu:2998: anāvṛṣṭir māhāmārī doṣā no dāhakā nṛpa /
GP12narsippu:3000: kārayel lakṣahomaṃ tu grāme yatra purādhipaḥ /
GP12narsippu:3001: kṛte tasmin mayokte tu āgacchati na tadbhayam // NsP_34.49 //
GP12narsippu:3009: homaṃ ca bhojanaṃ caiva tasya doṣaḥ praṇaśyati // NsP_34.53 //
GP12narsippu:3011: narasiṃhaṃ samārādhya lakṣahomaṃ tu kārayet // NsP_34.54 //
GP12narsippu:3014: kuru tvaṃ bhūpateḥ putra yadi vāñchasi sadgatim /
GP12narsippu:3017: santy araṇye hy amūlyāni patrapuṣpāṇi śākhinām // NsP_34.57 //
GP12narsippu:3020: mano niyamitaṃ yena muktis tasya kare sthitā // NsP_34.59 //
GP12narsippu:3022: ity evam uktaṃ bhṛgucoditena mayā tavehārcanam acyutasya /
GP12narsippu:3023: dine dine tvaṃ kuru viṣṇupūjāṃ vadasva cānyat kathayāmi kiṃ te // NsP_34.60 //
GP12narsippu:3025: iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe sahasrānīkacarite śrīviṣṇoḥ pūjāvidhir nāma catustriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ || NarP 34 ||
GP12narsippu:3028: aho mahat tvayā proktaṃ viṣṇvārādhanajaṃ phalam /
GP12narsippu:3029: suptās te muniśārdūla ye viṣṇuṃ nārcayanti vai // NsP_35.1 //
GP12narsippu:3031: bhaktyā taṃ pūjayiṣyāmi koṭihomaphalaṃ vada // NsP_35.2 //
GP12narsippu:3033: imam arthaṃ purā pṛṣṭaḥ śaunako guruṇā nṛpa /
GP12narsippu:3034: yat tasmai kathayām_asa śaunakas tad vādami te // NsP_35.3 //
GP12narsippu:3035: śaunakaṃ tu sukhāsīnaṃ paryapṛcchad bṛhaspatiḥ // NsP_35.4ab //
GP12narsippu:3037: lakṣahomasya yā bhūmiḥ koṭihomasya yā śubhā // NsP_35.4cd //
GP12narsippu:3038: tāṃ me kathaya viprendra homasya carite vidhim // NsP_35.5ab //
GP12narsippu:3040: ityukto guruṇā so 'tha lakṣahomādikaṃ vidhim // NsP_35.5cd //
GP12narsippu:3041: śaunako vaktum ārebhe yathāvan nṛpasattama // NsP_35.6ab //
GP12narsippu:3043: pravakṣyāmi yathāvat te śṛṇu devapurohita // NsP_35.6cd //
GP12narsippu:3045: yajñakarmaṇi śastāyā bhūmer lakṣaṇam uttamam // NsP_35.7 //
GP12narsippu:3047: ūrumātraṃ khanitvā ca śodhayet tāṃ viśeṣataḥ // NsP_35.8 //
GP12narsippu:3049: pramāṇaṃ bāhumātraṃ tu sarvataḥ kuṇḍalakṣaṇam // NsP_35.9 //
GP12narsippu:3051: upari mekhalāṃ kuryāc caturasrāṃ suvistarām // NsP_35.10 //
GP12narsippu:3055: brahmacaryavrataṃ kuryus trirātraṃ te dvijātayaḥ // NsP_35.12 //
GP12narsippu:3059: kauśam āsanam āsīnā ekāgramanasaḥ punaḥ // NsP_35.14 //
GP12narsippu:3060: ārabheyuś ca te yatnāt tato homam atandritāḥ /
GP12narsippu:3061: bhūmim ālikhya cābhyukṣya yatnād agniṃ nidhāpayet // NsP_35.15 //
GP12narsippu:3062: gṛhyoktena vidhānena homaṃ tatra ca homayet /
GP12narsippu:3063: āghārāv ājyabhāgau ca juhuyāt pūrvam eva tu // NsP_35.16 //
GP12narsippu:3067: savitā devatā tasya viśvāmitras tathā ṛṣiḥ // NsP_35.18 //
GP12narsippu:3068: tato vyāhṛtibhiḥ paścāj juhuyāc ca tilānvitam /
GP12narsippu:3069: yāvat prapūryate saṃkhyā lakṣaṃ vā koṭir eva vā // NsP_35.19 //
GP12narsippu:3072: tāvac ca bhojanaṃ dadyād yāvad dhomaṃ samācaret /
GP12narsippu:3073: samāpte dakṣiṇāṃ dadyād ṛtvigbhyaḥ śraddhayānvitaḥ // NsP_35.21 //
GP12narsippu:3074: yathārhatā na lobhena tataḥ śāntyudakena ca /
GP12narsippu:3075: prokṣayed grāmamadhye tu vyādhitāṃs tu viśeṣataḥ // NsP_35.22 //
GP12narsippu:3076: evaṃ kṛte tu homasya purasya nagarasya ca /
GP12narsippu:3077: rāṣṭrasya ca mahābhāga rājño janapadasya ca /
GP12narsippu:3082: grāme gṛhe vā purabāhyadeśe dvijair ayaṃ yatnakṛtaḥ purovidhiḥ /
GP12narsippu:3083: tatrāpi śāntir bhavitā narāṇāṃ gavāṃ ca bhṛtyaiḥ saha bhūpateś ca // NsP_35.25 //
GP12narsippu:3084: || iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe lakṣahomavidhir nāma pañcatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ || NarP 35 ||
GP12narsippu:3088: tān śṛṇuṣva mahīpāla pavitrān pāpanāśanān // NsP_36.1 //
GP12narsippu:3089: yathā matsyena rūpeṇa dattā vedāḥ svayaṃbhuve /
GP12narsippu:3090: madhukaiṭabhau ca nidhanaṃ prāpitau ca mahātmanā // NsP_36.2 //
GP12narsippu:3091: yathā kaurmeṇa rūpeṇa viṣṇunā mandaro dhṛtaḥ /
GP12narsippu:3092: yathā pṛthvī dhṛtā rājan vārāheṇa mahātmanā // NsP_36.3 //
GP12narsippu:3093: tenaiva nidhanaṃ prāpto yathā rājan mahābalaḥ /
GP12narsippu:3096: narasiṃhena devena prāpito nidhanaṃ nṛpa // NsP_36.5 //
GP12narsippu:3097: yathā baddho baliḥ pūrvaṃ vāmanena mahātmanā /
GP12narsippu:3098: indras tribhuvanādhyakṣaḥ kṛtas tena nṛpātmaja // NsP_36.6 //
GP12narsippu:3099: rāmeṇa bhūtvā ca yathā viṣṇunā rāvaṇo hataḥ /
GP12narsippu:3100: sagaṇāś cādbhutā rājan rākṣasā devakaṇṭakāḥ // NsP_36.7 //
GP12narsippu:3102: balabhadreṇa rāmeṇa yathā daityaḥ purā hataḥ // NsP_36.8 //
GP12narsippu:3103: yathā kṛṣṇena kaṃsādyā hatā daityāḥ suradviṣaḥ /
GP12narsippu:3104: kalau prāpte yathā buddho bhaven nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ // NsP_36.9 //
GP12narsippu:3106: samāpte tu kalau bhūyas tathā te kathayāmy aham // NsP_36.10 //
GP12narsippu:3107: harer anantasya parākramaṃ yaḥ śṛṇoti bhūpāla samāhitātmā /
GP12narsippu:3108: mayocyamānaṃ ca vimucya pāpaṃ prayāti viṣṇoḥ padam atyudāram // NsP_36.11 //
GP12narsippu:3109: || iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe hareḥ prādurbhāvānukramaṇe ṣaṭtriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ || NarP 36 ||
GP12narsippu:3113: na śakyaṃ vistarād vaktuṃ tān bravīmi samāsataḥ // NsP_37.1 //
GP12narsippu:3117: śrotrābhyām apatat toye svedabindudvayaṃ nṛpa // NsP_37.3 //
GP12narsippu:3122: sa cokto viṣṇunā rājan prajāḥ sṛja mahāmate /
GP12narsippu:3123: tathety uktvā jagannāthaṃ brahmāpi kamalodbhavaḥ // NsP_37.6 //
GP12narsippu:3125: tāvat tatra samāyātau tāv ubhau madhukaiṭabhau // NsP_37.7 //
GP12narsippu:3127: apakṛtya gatau ghorau dānavau baladarpitau // NsP_37.8 //
GP12narsippu:3129: duḥkhitaś cintayām_asa kathaṃ srakṣyāmi vai prajāḥ // NsP_37.9 //
GP12narsippu:3130: coditas tvaṃ sṛjasveti prajā devena tat katham /
GP12narsippu:3131: srakṣye 'haṃ jñānahīnas tu aho kaṣṭam upasthitam // NsP_37.10 //
GP12narsippu:3133: yatnato vedaśāstrāṇi smarann api na dṛṣṭavān // NsP_37.11 //
GP12narsippu:3134: tato viṣaṇṇacittas tu taṃ devaṃ puruṣottamam /
GP12narsippu:3135: ekāgramanasā samyak śāstreṇa stotum ārabhat // NsP_37.12 //
GP12narsippu:3137: oṃ namo vedanidhaye śāstrāṇāṃ nidhaye namaḥ /
GP12narsippu:3138: vijñānanidhaye nityaṃ karmaṇāṃ nidhaye namaḥ // NsP_37.13 //
GP12narsippu:3140: acintyāya namo nityaṃ sarvajñāya namo namaḥ // NsP_37.14 //
GP12narsippu:3142: sāmnāṃ mūrtis tvam evādya sarvadā sarvarūpavān // NsP_37.15 //
GP12narsippu:3144: dehi me tvaṃ sarvajñānaṃ devadeva namo namaḥ // NsP_37.16 //
GP12narsippu:3147: brahmāṇam āha deveśo dāsye te jñānam uttamam // NsP_37.17 //
GP12narsippu:3148: ity uktvā tu tadā viṣṇuś cintayām_asa pārthiva /
GP12narsippu:3149: kenāsya nītaṃ vijñānaṃ kena rūpeṇa cādadhe // NsP_37.18 //
GP12narsippu:3153: sa praviśya jalaṃ tūrṇaṃ kṣobhayām_asa taṃ hariḥ /
GP12narsippu:3154: praviśya ca sa pātālaṃ dṛṣṭavān madhukaiṭabhau // NsP_37.20 //
GP12narsippu:3155: tau mohayitvā tumulaṃ taj jñānaṃ jagṛhe hariḥ /
GP12narsippu:3157: ānīya brahmaṇe dattvā tyaktvā tan mātsyakaṃ nṛpa /
GP12narsippu:3158: jagaddhitāya sa punar yoganidrāvaśaṃ gataḥ // NsP_37.22 //
GP12narsippu:3159: tataḥ prabuddhau saṃkruddhau tāv ubhau madhukaiṭabhau /
GP12narsippu:3160: āgatya dadṛśāte tu śayānaṃ devam avyayam // NsP_37.23 //
GP12narsippu:3161: ayaṃ sa puruṣo dhūrta āvāṃ saṃmohya māyayā /
GP12narsippu:3162: ānīya vedaśāstrāṇi dattvā śete 'tra sādhuvat // NsP_37.24 //
GP12narsippu:3163: ity uktvā tau mahāghorau dānavau madhukaiṭabhau /
GP12narsippu:3164: bodhayām_asatus tūrṇaṃ śayānaṃ keśavaṃ nṛpa // NsP_37.25 //
GP12narsippu:3165: yuddhārtham āgatāv atra tvayā saha mahāmate /
GP12narsippu:3166: āvayor dehi saṃgrāmaṃ yudhyasvotthāya sāṃpratam // NsP_37.26 //
GP12narsippu:3168: tatheti coktvā tau devaḥ śārṅgaṃ sajjam athākarot // NsP_37.27 //
GP12narsippu:3170: khaṃ diśaḥ pradiśaś caiva pūrayām_asa līlayā // NsP_37.28 //
GP12narsippu:3171: tau ca rājan mahāvīryau jyāghoṣaṃ cakratus tadā /
GP12narsippu:3173: kṛṣṇaś ca yuyudhe tābhyāṃ līlayā jagataḥ patiḥ /
GP12narsippu:3174: samaṃ yuddhaṃ abhūd evaṃ teṣām astrāṇi muñcatām // NsP_37.30 //
GP12narsippu:3176: tāni śastrāṇi sarvāṇi ciccheda tilaśas tadā // NsP_37.31 //
GP12narsippu:3177: tau yuddhvā suciraṃ tena dānavau madhukaiṭabhau /
GP12narsippu:3178: hatau śārṅgavinirmuktaiḥ śaraiḥ kṛṣṇena durmadau // NsP_37.32 //
GP12narsippu:3179: tayos tu medasā rājan viṣṇunā kalpitā mahī /
GP12narsippu:3180: medinīti tataḥ saṃjñām avāpeyaṃ vasuṃdharā // NsP_37.33 //
GP12narsippu:3182: prajāḥ sasarja bhūpāla vedadṛṣṭena karmaṇā // NsP_37.34 //
GP12narsippu:3183: ya idaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ prādurbhāvaṃ harer nṛpa /
GP12narsippu:3184: vasitvā candrasadane vedavid brāhmaṇo bhavet // NsP_37.35 //
GP12narsippu:3185: mātsyaṃ vapus tan mahad adritulyaṃ vidyāmayaṃ lokahitāya viṣṇuḥ /
GP12narsippu:3186: āsthāya bhīmaṃ janalokasaṃsthaiḥ stuto 'tha yas taṃ smara bhūmipāla // NsP_37.36 //
GP12narsippu:3187: || iti śrīnarasiṃhapūrāṇe matsyaprādurbhāvo nāma saptatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ || NarP 37 ||
GP12narsippu:3190: purā devāsure yuddhe devā daityaiḥ parājitāḥ /
GP12narsippu:3191: sarve te śaraṇaṃ jagmuḥ kṣīrābdhitanayāpatim // NsP_38.1 //
GP12narsippu:3196: namas te padmanābhāya lokanāthāya śārṅgiṇe // NsP_38.3 //
GP12narsippu:3198: namas te viśvarūpāya sarvadevamayāya ca // NsP_38.4 //
GP12narsippu:3200: daityaiḥ parājitā deva vayaṃ yuddhe balānvitaiḥ /
GP12narsippu:3201: jayopāyaṃ hi no brūhi karuṇākara te namaḥ // NsP_38.6 //
GP12narsippu:3203: iti stuto tadā daivair devadevo janārdanaḥ /
GP12narsippu:3204: tān abravīd dharir devān teṣām evāgrataḥ sthitaḥ // NsP_38.7 //
GP12narsippu:3206: gatvā tatra surāḥ sarve saṃdhiṃ kuruta dānavaiḥ /
GP12narsippu:3207: manthānaṃ mandaraṃ kṛtvā netraṃ kṛtvā ca vāsukim // NsP_38.8 //
GP12narsippu:3209: dānavaiḥ sahitā bhūtvā manthadhvaṃ kṣīrasāgaram // NsP_38.9 //
GP12narsippu:3210: ahaṃ ca tatra sāhāyyaṃ kariṣyāmi divaukasaḥ /
GP12narsippu:3211: bhaviṣyaty amṛtaṃ tatra tatpānād balavattarāḥ // NsP_38.10 //
GP12narsippu:3213: yūyaṃ sarve mahābhāgās tejiṣṭhā raṇavikramāḥ // NsP_38.11 //
GP12narsippu:3214: indrādyās tu mahotsāhās tal labdhvāmṛtam uttamam /
GP12narsippu:3215: tato hi dānavāñ jetuṃ samarthā nātra saṃśayaḥ // NsP_38.12 //
GP12narsippu:3217: praṇamyāgatya nilayaṃ saṃdhiṃ kṛtvātha dānavaiḥ // NsP_38.13 //
GP12narsippu:3218: kṣīrābdher manthane sarve cakrur udyogam uttamam /
GP12narsippu:3219: balinā coddhṛto rājan mandarākhyo mahāgiriḥ // NsP_38.14 //
GP12narsippu:3221: sarvauṣadhīṃś ca prakṣipya devadaityaiḥ payonidhau // NsP_38.15 //
GP12narsippu:3223: sarve devahitārthāya viṣṇuś ca svayam āgataḥ // NsP_38.16 //
GP12narsippu:3224: tatra viṣṇuṃ samāsādya tataḥ sarve surāsurāḥ /
GP12narsippu:3225: sarve te maitrabhāvena kṣīrābdhes taṭam āśritāḥ // NsP_38.17 //
GP12narsippu:3226: manthānaṃ mandaraṃ kṛtvā netraṃ kṛtvātha vāsukim /
GP12narsippu:3227: tato mathitum ārabdhaṃ nṛpate tarasāmṛtam // NsP_38.18 //
GP12narsippu:3228: viṣṇunā mukhabhāge tu yojitā dānavās tadā /
GP12narsippu:3229: devatāḥ pucchabhāge tu mathanāya niyojitāḥ // NsP_38.19 //
GP12narsippu:3230: evaṃ ca mathanāt tatra mandaro 'dhaḥ praviśya ca /
GP12narsippu:3231: ādhāreṇa vinā rājan taṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasā hariḥ // NsP_38.20 //
GP12narsippu:3233: ātmānaṃ saṃpraviśyātha mandarasya girer adhaḥ // NsP_38.21 //
GP12narsippu:3235: upary ākrāntavān śailaṃ pṛthagrūpeṇa keśavaḥ // NsP_38.22 //
GP12narsippu:3236: cakarṣa nāgarājaṃ ca devaiḥ sārdhaṃ janārdanaḥ /
GP12narsippu:3238: tatas te tvarayā yuktā mamanthuḥ kṣīrasāgaram // NsP_38.23 //
GP12narsippu:3240: mathyamānāt tatas tasmāt kṣīrābdher abhavan nṛpa // NsP_38.24 //
GP12narsippu:3242: taṃ nāgā jagṛhuḥ sarve taccheṣaṃ śaṃkaro 'grahīt // NsP_38.25 //
GP12narsippu:3244: airāvataś ca nāgendro hariś coccaiḥśravāḥ punaḥ // NsP_38.26 //
GP12narsippu:3245: dvitīyāvartanād rājann utpannāv iti naḥ śrutam /
GP12narsippu:3247: caturthāt parijātaś ca utpannaḥ sa mahādrumaḥ // NsP_38.27 //
GP12narsippu:3248: pañcamād dhi himāṃśus tu protthitaḥ kṣīrasāgarāt /
GP12narsippu:3249: taṃ bhavaḥ śirasā dhatte nārīvat svastikaṃ nṛpa // NsP_38.28 //
GP12narsippu:3251: kṣīrodadher utthitāś ca gandharvāś ca sahasraśaḥ // NsP_38.29 //
GP12narsippu:3253: abhavan jātaharṣās te tatra sarve surāsurāḥ // NsP_38.30 //
GP12narsippu:3254: devapakṣe tato meghāḥ svalpaṃ varṣanti saṃsthitāḥ /
GP12narsippu:3255: kṛṣṇājñayā ca vāyuś ca sukhaṃ vāti surān prati // NsP_38.31 //
GP12narsippu:3257: nistejaso 'bhavan daityā nirvīryāś ca mahāmate // NsP_38.32 //
GP12narsippu:3258: tataḥ śrīr utthitā tasmāt kṣīrodād dhṛtapaṅkajā /
GP12narsippu:3259: vibhrājamānā rājendra diśaḥ sarvāḥ svatejasā // NsP_38.33 //
GP12narsippu:3263: harivakṣaḥsthalaṃ prāptā tataḥ sā kamalālayā // NsP_38.35 //
GP12narsippu:3264: tato 'mṛtaghaṭaṃ pūrṇaṃ dugdhvā tu payaso nidheḥ /
GP12narsippu:3265: dhanvantariḥ samuttasthau tataḥ prītāḥ surā nṛpa // NsP_38.36 //
GP12narsippu:3266: daityāḥ śriyā parityaktā duḥkhitās te 'bhavan nṛpa /
GP12narsippu:3267: nītvāmṛtaghaṭaṃ pūrṇaṃ te ca jagmur yathāsukham // NsP_38.37 //
GP12narsippu:3268: tataḥ strīrūpam akarod viṣṇur devahitāya vai /
GP12narsippu:3271: divyarūpāṃ tu tāṃ dṛṣṭvā mohitās te suradviṣaḥ // NsP_38.39 //
GP12narsippu:3272: sudhāpūrṇaghaṭaṃ te tu mohaiḥ saṃsthāpya sattama /
GP12narsippu:3273: kāmena pīḍitā hy āsann asurās tatra tatkṣaṇāt // NsP_38.40 //
GP12narsippu:3274: mohayitvā tu tān evam asurān avanīpate /
GP12narsippu:3275: amṛtaṃ tu samādāya devebhyaḥ pradadau hariḥ // NsP_38.41 //
GP12narsippu:3276: tat pītvā tu tato devā devadevaprasādataḥ /
GP12narsippu:3277: balavanto mahāvīryā raṇe jagmus tato 'surān // NsP_38.42 //
GP12narsippu:3278: jitvā raṇe 'surān devāḥ svāni rājyāni cakrire /
GP12narsippu:3279: etat te kathitaṃ rājan prādurbhāvo harer ayam // NsP_38.43 //
GP12narsippu:3280: kūrmākhyaḥ puṇyado nṝṇāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ paṭhatām api /
GP12narsippu:3282: divaukasānāṃ tu hitāya kevalaṃ rūpaṃ paraṃ pāvanam eva kīrtitam // NsP_38.44 //
GP12narsippu:3287: vārāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi samāhitamanāḥ śṛṇu // NsP_39.1 //
GP12narsippu:3289: trailokyam akhilaṃ vyāpya tiṣṭhanty ambhāṃsi sattama // NsP_39.2 //
GP12narsippu:3291: grastvā viṣṇus tataḥ śete tasminn ekārṇave jale // NsP_39.3 //
GP12narsippu:3294: diteḥ putro mahān āsīt kaśyapād iti naḥ śrutam /
GP12narsippu:3296: pātāle nivasan daityo devān uparurodha saḥ /
GP12narsippu:3297: yajvinām apākārāya yatate sa tu bhūtale // NsP_39.6 //
GP12narsippu:3298: atha bhūmyupari sthitvā martyā yakṣyanti devatāḥ /
GP12narsippu:3299: tena teṣāṃ balaṃ vīryaṃ tejaś cāpi bhaviṣyati // NsP_39.7 //
GP12narsippu:3300: iti matvā hiraṇyākṣaḥ kṛtasargaṃ tu brahmaṇā /
GP12narsippu:3301: bhūmer yā dhāraṇāśaktis tāṃ nītvā sa mahāsuraḥ // NsP_39.8 //
GP12narsippu:3303: vinā śaktyā ca jagatī praviveśa rasātalam // NsP_39.9 //
GP12narsippu:3304: nidrāvasāne sarvātmā kva sthitā medinīti vai /
GP12narsippu:3305: saṃcintya jñātvā yogena rasātalatalaṃ gatām // NsP_39.10 //
GP12narsippu:3306: atha vedamayaṃ rūpaṃ vārāhaṃ vapur āsthitam /
GP12narsippu:3309: agnijihvaṃ srucaṃ tuṇḍaṃ candrārkanayanaṃ mahat // NsP_39.12 //
GP12narsippu:3314: itthaṃ kṛtvā tu vārāhaṃ praviveśa vṛṣākapiḥ /
GP12narsippu:3316: praviśya ca hiraṇyākṣaṃ yuddhe jitvā vṛṣākapiḥ /
GP12narsippu:3317: daṃṣṭrāgreṇa tataḥ pṛthvīm samuddhṛtya rasātalāt // NsP_39.16 //
GP12narsippu:3319: saṃsthāpya parvatān sarvān yathāsthānam akalpayat // NsP_39.17 //
GP12narsippu:3320: vihāya rūpaṃ vārāhaṃ tīrthe koketi viśrute /
GP12narsippu:3321: vaiṣṇavānāṃ hitārthāya kṣetraṃ tad guptam uttamam // NsP_39.18 //
GP12narsippu:3322: brahmarūpaṃ samāsthāya punaḥ sṛṣṭiṃ cakāra saḥ /
GP12narsippu:3323: viṣṇuḥ pāti jagat sarvam evaṃbhūto yuge yuge /
GP12narsippu:3324: hanti cānte jagat sarvaṃ rudrarūpī janārdanaḥ // NsP_39.19 //
GP12narsippu:3325: vedāntavedyaḥ puruṣo vṛṣākapeḥ kathām imāṃ yaś ca śṛṇoti mānavaḥ /
GP12narsippu:3326: dṛḍhāṃ matiṃ yajñatanau viveśya vai vihāya pāpaṃ ca naro hariṃ vrajet // NsP_39.20 //
GP12narsippu:3327: || iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe vārāhaprādurbhāvo nāma ekonacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ || NarP 39 ||
GP12narsippu:3330: vārāhaḥ kathito hy evaṃ prādurbhāvo hares tava /
GP12narsippu:3331: sāṃprataṃ nārasiṃhaṃ tu pravakṣyāmi nibodha me // NsP_40.1 //
GP12narsippu:3334: tapatas tasya saṃtuṣṭo brahmā taṃ prāha dānavam /
GP12narsippu:3335: varaṃ varaya daityendra yas te manasi vartate // NsP_40.3 //
GP12narsippu:3337: uvāca natvā deveśaṃ brahmāṇaṃ vinayānvitaḥ // NsP_40.4 //
GP12narsippu:3339: yadi tvaṃ varadānāya pravṛtto bhagavan mama /
GP12narsippu:3340: yad yad vṛṇomy ahaṃ brahmaṃs tat tan me dātum arhasi // NsP_40.5 //
GP12narsippu:3341: na śuṣkeṇa na cārdreṇa na jalena na vahninā /
GP12narsippu:3342: na kāṣṭhena na kīṭena pāṣāṇena na vāyunā // NsP_40.6 //
GP12narsippu:3343: nāyudhena na śūlena na śailena na mānuṣaiḥ /
GP12narsippu:3344: na surair asurair vāpi na gandharvair na rākṣasaiḥ // NsP_40.7 //
GP12narsippu:3345: na kiṃnarair na yakṣais tu vidyādharabhujaṃgamaiḥ /
GP12narsippu:3346: na vānarair mṛgair vāpi naiva mātṛgaṇair api // NsP_40.8 //
GP12narsippu:3347: nābhyantare na bāhye tu nānyair maraṇahetubhiḥ /
GP12narsippu:3348: na dine na ca naktaṃ me tvatprasādād bhaven mṛtiḥ // NsP_40.9 //
GP12narsippu:3349: iti vai devadeveśa varaṃ tvatto vṛṇomy aham // NsP_40.10ab //
GP12narsippu:3351: ityukto daityarājena brahmā taṃ prāha pārthiva // NsP_40.10cd //
GP12narsippu:3352: tapasā tava tuṣṭo 'haṃ mahatā tu varān imān /
GP12narsippu:3353: durlabhān api daityendra dadāmi paramādbhutān // NsP_40.11 //
GP12narsippu:3354: anyeṣāṃ nedṛśaṃ dattaṃ na tair itthaṃ tapaḥ kṛtam /
GP12narsippu:3355: tvatprārthitaṃ mayā dattaṃ sarvaṃ te cāstu daityapa // NsP_40.12 //
GP12narsippu:3356: gaccha bhuṅkṣva mahābāho tapasām ūrjitaṃ phalam /
GP12narsippu:3357: ity evaṃ daityarājasya hiraṇyakaśipoḥ purā // NsP_40.13 //
GP12narsippu:3358: dattvā varān yayau brahmā brahmalokam anuttamam /
GP12narsippu:3359: so 'pi labdhavaro daityo balavān baladarpitaḥ // NsP_40.14 //
GP12narsippu:3360: devān siṃhān raṇe jitvā divaḥ prācyāvayad bhuvi /
GP12narsippu:3361: divi rājyaṃ svayaṃ cakre sarvaśaktisamanvitam // NsP_40.15 //
GP12narsippu:3362: devā api bhayāt tasya rudrāś caivarṣayo nṛpa /
GP12narsippu:3363: vicerur avanau sarve bibhrāṇā mānuṣīṃ tanum // NsP_40.16 //
GP12narsippu:3365: āhūya sarvā rājendra vākyaṃ cedam abhāṣata // NsP_40.17 //
GP12narsippu:3366: na yaṣṭavyaṃ na hotavyaṃ na dātavyaṃ surān prati /
GP12narsippu:3367: yuṣmābhir aham evādya trailokyādhipatiḥ prajāḥ // NsP_40.18 //
GP12narsippu:3369: tāś ca sarvās tathā cakrur daityendrasya bhayān nṛpa // NsP_40.19 //
GP12narsippu:3373: gate kāle tu mahati devāḥ sendrā bṛhaspatim // NsP_40.21 //
GP12narsippu:3376: trailokyahāriṇaḥ śīghraṃ vadhopāyaṃ vadasva naḥ // NsP_40.23ab //
GP12narsippu:3378: śṛṇudhvaṃ mama vākyāni svapadaprāptaye surāḥ // NsP_40.23cd //
GP12narsippu:3380: śoko nāśayati prajñāṃ śoko nāśayati śrutam // NsP_40.24 //
GP12narsippu:3381: śoko matiṃ nāśayati nāsti śokasamo ripuḥ /
GP12narsippu:3382: soḍhuṃ śakyo 'gnisaṃbandhaḥ śastrasparśaś ca dāruṇaḥ // NsP_40.25 //
GP12narsippu:3383: na tu śokabhavaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃsoḍhuṃ nṛpa śakyate /
GP12narsippu:3384: kālān nimittāc ca vayaṃ lakṣyāmas tatkṣayaṃ surāḥ // NsP_40.26 //
GP12narsippu:3385: budhāś ca sarve sarvatra sthitā vakṣyanti nityaśaḥ /
GP12narsippu:3386: acirād eva duṣṭo 'sau naśyaty eva parasparam // NsP_40.27 //
GP12narsippu:3388: hiraṇyakaśipor nāśaṃ śakunāni vadanti me // NsP_40.28 //
GP12narsippu:3389: yata evam ato devāḥ sarve gacchata māciram /
GP12narsippu:3390: kṣīrodasyottaraṃ tīraṃ prasupto yatra keśavaḥ // NsP_40.29 //
GP12narsippu:3391: yuṣmābhiḥ saṃstuto devaḥ prasanno bhavati kṣaṇāt /
GP12narsippu:3392: sa hi prasanno daityasya vadhopāyaṃ vadiṣyati // NsP_40.30 //
GP12narsippu:3393: ityuktās tena devās te sādhu sādhv ity athābruvan /
GP12narsippu:3394: prītyā ca parayā yuktā gantuṃ cakrur athodyamam // NsP_40.31 //
GP12narsippu:3395: puṇye tithau śubhe lagne puṇyaṃ svasti ca maṅgalam /
GP12narsippu:3396: kārayitvā munivaraiḥ prasthitās te divaukasaḥ // NsP_40.32 //
GP12narsippu:3398: te śarvam agrataḥ kṛtvā kṣīrābdher uttaraṃ taṭam // NsP_40.33 //
GP12narsippu:3399: tatra gatvā surāḥ sarve viṣṇuṃ jiṣṇuṃ janārdanam /
GP12narsippu:3400: astuvan vividhaiḥ stotraiḥ pūjayantaḥ pratasthire // NsP_40.34 //
GP12narsippu:3402: astuvan nāmabhiḥ puṇyair ekāgramanasā harim // NsP_40.35 //
GP12narsippu:3404: viṣṇur jiṣṇur vibhur devo yajñeśo yajñapālakaḥ /
GP12narsippu:3405: prabhaviṣṇur grasiṣṇuś ca lokātmā lokapālakaḥ // NsP_40.36 //
GP12narsippu:3409: nārāyaṇo naro haṃso viṣṇuseno hutāśanaḥ // NsP_40.38 //
GP12narsippu:3411: vaikuṇṭhaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sūryaḥ surārcitaḥ // NsP_40.39 //
GP12narsippu:3415: padmanābho hṛṣīkeśo vibhur dāmodaro hariḥ // NsP_40.41 //
GP12narsippu:3419: kāruṇyaḥ karuṇo vyāsaḥ pāpahā śāntivardhanaḥ // NsP_40.43 //
GP12narsippu:3423: tapovāso damo vāsaḥ satyavāsaḥ sanātanaḥ // NsP_40.45 //
GP12narsippu:3425: pūrṇaḥ pūrtiḥ purāṇajñaḥ puṇyajñaḥ puṇyavardhanaḥ // NsP_40.46 //
GP12narsippu:3426: śaṅkhī cakrī gadī śārṅgī lāṅgalī muśalī halī /
GP12narsippu:3427: kirīṭī kuṇḍalī hārī mekhalī kavacī dhvajī // NsP_40.47 //
GP12narsippu:3429: śāntaḥ śāntikaraḥ śāstā śaṃkaraḥ śaṃtanustutaḥ // NsP_40.48 //
GP12narsippu:3431: sāvanaḥ sāhasī sattvaḥ saṃpūrṇāṃśaḥ samṛddhimān // NsP_40.49 //
GP12narsippu:3435: tvaṃ yajñas tvaṃ vaṣaṭkāras tvam oṃkāras tvam agnayaḥ // NsP_40.51 //
GP12narsippu:3436: tvaṃ svāhā tvaṃ svadhā devas tvaṃ sudhā puruṣottama /
GP12narsippu:3437: namo devādidevāya viṣṇave śāśvatāya ca // NsP_40.52 //
GP12narsippu:3440: ity etair nāmabhir divyaiḥ saṃstuto madhusūdanaḥ // NsP_40.53cd //
GP12narsippu:3441: uvāca prakaṭībhūtvā devān sarvān idaṃ vacaḥ // NsP_40.54ab //
GP12narsippu:3443: yuṣmābhiḥ saṃstuto devā nāmabhiḥ kevalaiḥ śubhaiḥ // NsP_40.54cd //
GP12narsippu:3444: ata eva prasanno 'smi kim arthaṃ karavāṇi vaḥ // NsP_40.55ab //
GP12narsippu:3447: tvam eva jānāsi hare kiṃ tasmāt paripṛcchasi // NsP_40.56ab //
GP12narsippu:3452: etena yas tu māṃ nityaṃ tvayoktena mahāmate /
GP12narsippu:3453: tenāhaṃ pūjito nityaṃ bhavāmīha tvayā yathā // NsP_40.58 //
GP12narsippu:3454: prīto 'haṃ gaccha deva tvaṃ kailāsaśikharaṃ śubham /
GP12narsippu:3455: tvayā stuto haniṣyāmi hiraṇyakaśipuṃ bhava // NsP_40.59 //
GP12narsippu:3456: gacchadhvam adhunā devāḥ kālaṃ kaṃcit pratīkṣatām /
GP12narsippu:3457: yadāsya tanayo dhīmān prahlādo nāma vaiṣṇavaḥ // NsP_40.60 //
GP12narsippu:3458: tasya drohaṃ yadā daityaḥ kariṣyati surāṃs tadā /
GP12narsippu:3460: ity uktvā viṣṇunā devā natvā viṣṇuṃ yayur nṛpa // NsP_40.61 //
GP12narsippu:3461: || iti śrīnarasiṃhapurāṇe viṣṇor nāmastotraṃ nāma catvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ || NarP 40 ||
GP12narsippu:3465: prādurbhāvaṃ nṛsiṃhasya yathāvad vaktum arhasi // NsP_41.1 //
GP12narsippu:3467: dhanyā vayaṃ mahāyogiṃs tvatprasādān mahāmune // NsP_41.2 //
GP12narsippu:3468: sudhāṃ pibāmo durlabhyāṃ dhanyāḥ śrīśakathābhidhām // NsP_41.3ab //
GP12narsippu:3470: purā hiraṇyakaśipos taporthaṃ gacchato vanam // NsP_41.3cd //
GP12narsippu:3471: digdāho bhumikampaś ca jātas tasya mahātmanaḥ /
GP12narsippu:3472: vārito bandhubhir bhṛtyair mitraiś ca hitakāribhiḥ // NsP_41.4 //
GP12narsippu:3473: śakunā viguṇā rājañ jātās tac ca na śobhanam /
GP12narsippu:3474: trailokyādhipatis tvaṃ hi sarve devāḥ parājitāḥ // NsP_41.5 //
GP12narsippu:3475: tavāsti na bhayaṃ saumya kimarthaṃ tapyate tapaḥ /
GP12narsippu:3476: prayojanaṃ na paśyāmo vayaṃ buddhyā samanvitāḥ // NsP_41.6 //
GP12narsippu:3477: yo bhaven nyūnakāmo hi tapascaryāṃ karoti saḥ /
GP12narsippu:3478: evaṃ tair vāryamāṇo 'pi durmado madamohitaḥ // NsP_41.7 //
GP12narsippu:3482: kiṃ karomi kathaṃ daityas tapaso vinivartate // NsP_41.9 //
GP12narsippu:3484: praṇamya prāha bhūpāla nārado munisattamaḥ // NsP_41.10 //
GP12narsippu:3487: yeṣām manasi govindas te vai nārhanti śocitum // NsP_41.11 //
GP12narsippu:3489: nārāyaṇo jagatsvāmī matiṃ me saṃpradāsyati // NsP_41.12 //
GP12narsippu:3491: ity uktvānamya pitaraṃ vāsudevaṃ hṛdi smaran /
GP12narsippu:3492: prayātaḥ parvatenaiva sārdhaṃ sa munipuṃgavaḥ // NsP_41.13 //
GP12narsippu:3493: kalaviṅkau tu tau bhūtvā kailāśaṃ parvatottamam /
GP12narsippu:3494: yatrāste ditijaśreṣṭho dvitrair mitraiḥ parīvṛtaḥ // NsP_41.14 //
GP12narsippu:3496: śṛṇvatas tasya daityasya prāha gambhīrayā girā // NsP_41.15 //
GP12narsippu:3498: trivāraṃ prajapitvā vai nārado maunam āśritaḥ // NsP_41.16 //
GP12narsippu:3499: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya kalaviṅkasya sādaram /
GP12narsippu:3500: hiraṇyakaśipur daityaḥ kruddhaś cāpaṃ samādade // NsP_41.17 //
GP12narsippu:3501: bāṇaṃ dhanuṣi saṃdhāya yāvan muñcati tau prati /
GP12narsippu:3502: tāvad uḍḍīya tau bhūpa gatau nāradaparvatau // NsP_41.18 //
GP12narsippu:3504: tyaktvā tam āśramaṃ bhūyo nagaraṃ svaṃ mahīpate // NsP_41.19 //
GP12narsippu:3505: tasyāpi bhāryā suśroṇī kayādhūr nāma nāmataḥ /
GP12narsippu:3506: tadā rajasvalā bhūtvā snātābhūd daivayogataḥ // NsP_41.20 //
GP12narsippu:3507: rātrāv ekāntasamaye tayā pṛṣṭaḥ sa daityarāṭ /
GP12narsippu:3508: svāmin yadā tapaścaryāṃ kartuṃ gehād vanaṃ gataḥ // NsP_41.21 //
GP12narsippu:3509: tadā tvayoktaṃ varṣāṇām ayutaṃ me tapas tv idam /
GP12narsippu:3510: tat kimarthaṃ mahārāja sāṃprataṃ tyaktavān vratam // NsP_41.22 //
GP12narsippu:3511: tathyaṃ kathaya me nātha snehāt pṛcchāmi daityapa // NsP_41.23ab //
GP12narsippu:3513: śṛṇu cārvaṅgi me tathyāṃ vācaṃ vratavināśinīm // NsP_41.23cd //
GP12narsippu:3516: vyāharantau śubhāṃ vāṇīṃ namo nārāyaṇeti ca /
GP12narsippu:3517: vāradvayaṃ trayaṃ ceti vyāhṛtaṃ vacanaṃ śubhe // NsP_41.25 //
GP12narsippu:3518: tena me manasi krodho jāto 'tīva varānane /
GP12narsippu:3519: kodaṇḍe śaram ādhāya yāvan muñcāmi bhāmini // NsP_41.26 //
GP12narsippu:3520: tāvat tau pakṣiṇau bhītau gatau deśāntaraṃ tv aham /
GP12narsippu:3521: tyaktvā vrataṃ samāyāto bhāvikāryabalena vai // NsP_41.27 //
GP12narsippu:3524: ṛtukāle tu saṃprāpte jāto garbhas tadaiva hi // NsP_41.28 //
GP12narsippu:3527: tad agre kathayiṣyāmi bhūpa śraddhāparo bhava /
GP12narsippu:3528: tasya sūnur abhud bhaktaḥ prahlādo janmavaiṣṇavaḥ // NsP_41.30 //
GP12narsippu:3530: yathā kalau harer bhaktiḥ pāśasaṃsāramocanī // NsP_41.31 //
GP12narsippu:3531: sa vardhamāno virarāja bālaiḥ saha trayīnāthapadeṣu bhaktyā /
GP12narsippu:3532: bālo 'lpadeho mahatīṃ mahātmā vistārayan bhāti sa viṣṇubhaktim // NsP_41.32 //
GP12narsippu:3533: yathā caturthaṃ yugam āptadharma kāmārthamokṣaṃ kila kīrtidaṃ hi /
GP12narsippu:3534: sa bālalīlāsu sahānyaḍimbhaiḥ prahelikākrīḍanakeṣu nityam // NsP_41.33 //
GP12narsippu:3535: kathāprasaṅgeṣu ca kṛṣṇam eva provāca yasmāt sa hi tatsvabhāvaḥ /
GP12narsippu:3537: taṃ padmavaktraṃ daityendraḥ kadācit strīvṛtaḥ khalaḥ /
GP12narsippu:3539: gṛhītvā tu kare putraṃ paṭṭikā yā suśobhanā /
GP12narsippu:3541: tam āhūya mudāviṣṭo lālayan prāha putrakam /
GP12narsippu:3542: putra te jananī nityaṃ sudhīr me tvā praśaṃsati // NsP_41.37 //
GP12narsippu:3543: atha tad vada yat kiṃcid guruveśmani śikṣitam /
GP12narsippu:3544: vicāryānandajananaṃ samyag āyāti tad vada // NsP_41.38 //
GP12narsippu:3546: govindaṃ trijagadvandyaṃ prabhuṃ natvā bravīmi te // NsP_41.39 //
GP12narsippu:3547: iti śatroḥ stavaṃ śrutvā putroktaṃ strīvṛtaḥ khalaḥ /
GP12narsippu:3548: kruddho 'pi taṃ vañcayituṃ jahāsoccaiḥ prahṛṣṭavat // NsP_41.40 //
GP12narsippu:3549: āliṅgya tanayaṃ prāha śṛṇu bāla hitaṃ vacaḥ /
GP12narsippu:3550: rāma govinda kṛṣṇeti viṣṇo mādhava śrīpate // NsP_41.41 //
GP12narsippu:3551: evaṃ vadanti ye sarve te putra mama vairiṇaḥ /
GP12narsippu:3552: śāsitās tu mayedānīṃ tvayedaṃ kva śrutaṃ vacaḥ // NsP_41.42 //
GP12narsippu:3554: prahlādaḥ prāha he ārya maivaṃ brūyāḥ kadācana // NsP_41.43 //
GP12narsippu:3556: kṛṣṇeti yo naro brūyāt so 'bhayaṃ vindate padam // NsP_41.44 //
GP12narsippu:3558: rāma mādhava kṛṣṇeti smara bhaktyātmaśuddhaye // NsP_41.45 //
GP12narsippu:3559: gurave 'pi bravīmy etad yato hitakaraṃ param /
GP12narsippu:3562: kenāyaṃ bālako nīto daśām etāṃ sumadhyamām // NsP_41.47 //
GP12narsippu:3563: dhig dhig hāheti duṣputra kiṃ me kṛtam aghaṃ mahat /
GP12narsippu:3565: uktveti parito vīkṣya punar āha śiśor gurum // NsP_41.48 //
GP12narsippu:3567: iti śrutvā tato daityās tam ānīya nyavedayan /
GP12narsippu:3568: dhīmān ūce khalaṃ bhūpaṃ devāntaka parīkṣatām // NsP_41.49 //
GP12narsippu:3569: līlayaiva jitaṃ deva trailokyaṃ nikhilaṃ tvayā /
GP12narsippu:3570: asakṛn na hi roṣeṇa kiṃ kruddhasyālpake mayi // NsP_41.50 //
GP12narsippu:3571: iti sāmavacaḥ śrutvā dvijoktaṃ prāha daityarāṭ /
GP12narsippu:3572: viṣṇustavaṃ mama sutaṃ pāpa bālam apīpaṭhaḥ // NsP_41.51 //
GP12narsippu:3573: uktveti tanayaṃ prāha rājā sāmnāmalaṃ sutam /
GP12narsippu:3574: mamātmajasya kiṃ jāḍyāṃ tava caitad dvijaiḥ kṛtam // NsP_41.52 //
GP12narsippu:3575: viṣṇupakṣair dhruvaṃ dhūrtair mūḍha nityaṃ parityaja /
GP12narsippu:3576: tyaja dvijaprasaṅgaṃ hi dvijasaṅgo hy aśobhanaḥ // NsP_41.53 //
GP12narsippu:3577: asmatkulocitaṃ tejo yair dvijais tu tirohitam /
GP12narsippu:3578: yasya yat saṃgatiḥ puṃso maṇivat syāt sa tadguṇaḥ // NsP_41.54 //
GP12narsippu:3579: svakularddhyai tato dhīmān svayūthān eva saṃśrayet /
GP12narsippu:3581: svayam eva bhajan viṣṇuṃ manda kiṃ tvaṃ na lajjase /
GP12narsippu:3582: viśvanāthasya me sūnur bhūtvānyaṃ nātham icchasi // NsP_41.56 //
GP12narsippu:3583: śṛṇu vatsa jagattattvaṃ kaścin nāsti nijaḥ prabhuḥ /
GP12narsippu:3584: yaḥ śūraḥ sa śriyaṃ bhuṅkte sa prabhuḥ sa maheśvaraḥ // NsP_41.57 //
GP12narsippu:3586: tyaja jāḍyam ataḥ śauryaṃ bhajasva svakulocitam // NsP_41.58 //
GP12narsippu:3587: anye 'pi tvāṃ haniṣyanti vadiṣyanti janās tv idam /
GP12narsippu:3588: asuro 'yaṃ surān stauti mārjāra iva mūṣakān // NsP_41.59 //
GP12narsippu:3589: dveṣyān śikhīva phaṇino durnimittam idaṃ dhruvam /
GP12narsippu:3590: labdhvāpi mahad aiśvaryaṃ lāghavaṃ yānty abuddhayaḥ // NsP_41.60 //
GP12narsippu:3591: yathāyaṃ matsutaḥ stutyaḥ stāvakān stauti nīcavat /
GP12narsippu:3592: re mūḍha dṛṣṭvāpy aiśvasryaṃ mama brūṣe puro harim // NsP_41.61 //
GP12narsippu:3593: asadṛśasya tu hareḥ stutir eṣā viḍambanā /
GP12narsippu:3594: ity uktvā tanayaṃ bhūpa jātakrodho bhayānakaḥ // NsP_41.62 //
GP12narsippu:3595: jihmaṃ nirīkṣya ca prāha tadguruṃ kampayan ruṣā /
GP12narsippu:3596: yāhi yāhi dvijapaśo sādhu śādhi sutaṃ mama // NsP_41.63 //
GP12narsippu:3597: prasāda ity eṣa vadan sa vipro jagāma gehaṃ khalarājasevī /
GP12narsippu:3598: viṣṇuṃ visṛjyānvasarac ca daityaṃ kiṃ vā na kuryur bharaṇāya lubdhāḥ // NsP_41.64 //
GP12narsippu:3602: so 'py āśu nīto guruveśma daityair daityendrasūnur haribhaktibhūṣaṇaḥ /
GP12narsippu:3603: aśeṣavidyānivahena sākaṃ kālena kaumāram avāpa yogī // NsP_42.1 //
GP12narsippu:3604: prāyeṇa kaumāram avāpya lokaḥ puṣṇāti nāstikyam asadgatiṃ ca /
GP12narsippu:3605: tasmin vayaḥsthasya bahirviraktir bhavaty abhūc citram aje ca bhaktiḥ // NsP_42.2 //
GP12narsippu:3607: ānāyya praṇataṃ prāha prahlādaṃ viditeśvaram // NsP_42.3 //
GP12narsippu:3609: idānīṃ bhrājase bhāsvān nīhārād iva nirgataḥ // NsP_42.4 //
GP12narsippu:3610: bālye vayaṃ ca tvam iva dvijair jāḍyāya mohitāḥ /
GP12narsippu:3613: vinyasya svāṃ ciradhṛtāṃ sukhī paśyan śriyaṃ tava // NsP_42.6 //
GP12narsippu:3614: yadā yadā hi naipuṇyaṃ pitā putrasya paśyati /
GP12narsippu:3615: tadā tadādhiṃ tyaktvā nu mahat saukhyam avāpnuyāt // NsP_42.7 //
GP12narsippu:3617: na citraṃ putra tac chrotuṃ kiṃ nu me vāñchataḥ śrutī // NsP_42.8 //
GP12narsippu:3619: yuddhavraṇaṃ ca gātreṣu māyināṃ ca mahotsavaḥ // NsP_42.9 //
GP12narsippu:3621: jagāda yogī niśśaṅkaṃ prahlādaḥ praṇato gurum // NsP_42.10 //
GP12narsippu:3623: kiṃtu tā vaiṣṇavīr vāco muktvā nānyā vicārayet // NsP_42.11 //
GP12narsippu:3624: nītiḥ sūktiḥ kathāḥ śrāvyāḥ śrāvyaṃ kāvyaṃ ca tad vacaḥ /
GP12narsippu:3625: yatra saṃsṛtiduḥkhaugha- kakṣāgnir gīyate hariḥ // NsP_42.12 //
GP12narsippu:3627: arthaśātreṇa kiṃ tāta yatra saṃsṛtisaṃtatiḥ // NsP_42.13 //
GP12narsippu:3629: vaiṣṇavaṃ vāṅmayaṃ tasmāc *chrāvyaṃ sevyaṃ ca sarvadā // NsP_42.14 //
GP12narsippu:3630: mumukṣubhir bhavakleśān no cen naiva sukhī bhavet /
GP12narsippu:3631: iti tasya vacaḥ śṛṇvan hiraṇyakaśipus tadā // NsP_42.15 //
GP12narsippu:3632: jajvāla daityarāṭ tapta- sarpir adbhir ivādhikam /
GP12narsippu:3635: parito vīkṣya saṃprāha kruddho daityabhaṭān idam // NsP_42.17 //
GP12narsippu:3637: utkṛttyotkṛttya marmāṇi rakṣitāstu hariḥ svayam // NsP_42.18 //
GP12narsippu:3641: acyutasya priyaṃ bhaktaṃ taṃ jagnuḥ patinoditāḥ // NsP_42.20 //
GP12narsippu:3643: akṛtrimarasam bhaktaṃ tam itthaṃ dhyānaniścalam // NsP_42.21 //
GP12narsippu:3645: athālabdhapadāny asya gātre śastrāṇi rakṣasām // NsP_42.22 //
GP12narsippu:3647: kiṃ prākṛtāni śastrāṇi kariṣyanti haripriye // NsP_42.23 //
GP12narsippu:3649: pīḍayanti janāṃs tāvad vyādhayo rākṣasā grahāḥ // NsP_42.24 //
